Are you sick and tired that either your cousin or brother keeps on winning each game of Scrabble, Words With Friends, Jamble, Up words, Wordsmith, Wordstone, Ruzzle, Words by Post, Crossword Puzzles, or Aworded you play with them? Would you like to have the reputation of a walking dictionary that uses elaborate vocabulary? Aworded Solver will save the day, and you'll no longer be known as the family loser. In addition to this, Aworded Solver is easy to use. All you have to do is enter the letters you have, using asterisk when you have a joker tile, and tap enter. A list of words will come up, with the biggest words first, with the number of points given with each word next to it. The app also has a semi transparent background, so that you can see the game board while using the app. Depending on the number of letters inputted and the kind of device you own, the process of the word searching after you press enter will take more or less time, but it is generally quite fast. Contact me at cowknow@gmail.com if you find an error or if you think anything could be improved. Thanks to Pablo Martinez O'Reilly
release_text: - Añadido el dichoso mensaje de las cookies, lo siento... - Cambiada la letra del comodín, ahora es más visible.

description: If your kid has ever wanted to run their own store, here’s their chance! In Dr. Panda’s Supermarket your kid will work on their organizational and spatial skills while playing fun, store-themed minigames. Helping animals find the foods they need, weighing different vegetables, wrangling shopping carts and organizing crates of food in the back are just a few of the many activities waiting in store for your 2-6 year old (and you ;))! Key Features: - Over 10 store-themed minigames, from using a shopping list to organizing differently shaped boxes! - Learn about numbers and money - No text, and a child-friendly UI that’s easy for even the youngest kids to play and enjoy on their own - 6 different animals and their cute children that come to shop. - Kid-safe: No third-party advertising or in-app purchases. - Robust parental controls - Lots of fun secrets to discover on every screen Privacy Policy As a designer of kids’ games, we understand how important privacy is in this modern, digital world. You can read our privacy policy here: http://www.drpandagames.com/privacy About Dr. Panda Dr. Panda is a developer of games for kids. We develop games with educational values that help kids learn about the world. All of our games are safe and do not contain inappropriate content, in-app purchases or any third-party advertising. If you’d like to know more about us and how we design games for kids visit our website www.drpandagames.com/about. If you have any questions feel free to send us an email at support@drpandagames.com or contact us on Facebook (www.facebook.com/drpandagames) or Twitter (www.twitter.com/drpandagames) or Instagram www.instagram.com/drpandagames.

"This is a live wallpaper of the digital clock. Function from the configuration screen, you can customize the display. And image, or select from the color the background of the wallpaper. -Change clock size, position of the watch · ON / OFF battery information, date of This app is not a widget. Because it has been created in Japan, this app has become a Japanese description of the setting screen. Please set the live wallpaper from the individual setting of the mobile."

Infinite Monsters is the #1 action game available in Google Play which takes Android gaming to new heights with gorgeous visuals and endless adrenaline fueled battles. In a world filled with monsters where everything else is ruined and polluted by radiation, you have to wipe out the infinite monsters by travelling around the exotic world shores locations, battling zombies, demons, dino like monsters and more! The game is instantly playable and simple to control while the difficulty of the game becomes more and more hard as you level up. Now pick up the weapons and shoot the monsters with nothing to lose! How to Play: - Tap bottom left key to move and tap bottom right to fire - By default you have a basic pistol and unlimited amount of ammo with low lethality. Kill those monsters and earn your cash for new weapons and ammo. - You also have a special skill to protect yourself initially. Buy more new skills in the shop to enhance your ability. Game Features: - Charming hand-drawn hunter characters and monsters - Equip yourself with 14 different weapons and 7 different special skills - Crisp graphics and Immersive CD quality audio
release_text: v1.0.3: 1) Fixed some minor bugs of the game 2) Created a new Icon for the game

description: Skin for Animated Weather. You have to install Animated Weather first.

The quiz consists of guessing the simple past and the past participle of an English irregular verb shown in simple present. At every stage you will see a random English verb, and you can guess the related simple past and past participle by clicking on the correct answer. While playing no internet access is required.
release_text: Removed unused "Buy Dictionary" item from menu

description: Welcome to SeaPlane City, your mobile flight simulator! Get ready to jump into your very own amphibious sea plane and go on a tour of a vast city. Chase down airliners or land on aircraft carriers! Offers both joystick and tilt controls with adjustable sensitivity. Realistic flight simulation thats 100% FREE! Just updated with tons of new content and features! Never before has flying been so realistic & fun on mobile! Enjoy dodging skyscrapers and finding new places to land or crash in this mobile seaplane flight simulator. Featuring music by http://MatthewPablo.com HOW TO PLAY: Use the on screen joystick, or tilt controls, to control the aircraft. On screen buttons can be tapped to control throttle, gear, brake, camera, and camera reset. You can reset your airplane in the pause menu. FEATURES: *Realistic flight simulator for mobile! *Working controls, flaps, and surfaces! *Classic aircraft carriers to land on *Airline traffic in the skies. *4 Cameras to choose from(cockpit, orbit, tower, chase). *Massive city to tour, land, and crash in. FOLLOW US: *Like on Facebook - http://facebook.com/DMTSource *Follow on Twitter - https://twitter.com/@DMTSource *Follow on Google+ - http://google.com/+Dmtsource If you have any suggestions or comments please contact us, we hope to hear from you! DMT Source, LLC is an Orlando, FL USA, based developer.

*Known issues with Captivate and Xperia devices* Real Shark Aquarium is a beautiful display of sea life. This is a pure oceanic masterpiece and certainly one of the best marine-life apps on the market. This tank has whale sharks, sting rays, fish, and other signs of wildlife. It is an HD display of the 2nd biggest aquarium in the world. This is real life and not a 3D OpenGL render of fish like others such as aniPet. This is a live wallpaper. To install, go to the Home screen, press Menu, Wallpaper, Live Wallpaper. **Be sure to visit the settings to optimize for your device** *Known issues with Captivate and Xperia devices!*
release_text: Optimized for new devices such as HTC Evo 3D (3vo) and other high-res display devices including tablets.

description: Burger Time! Dozens of Delicious & Wacky Burgers & Groovy Chef Gadgets! Flip & Fry Perfect Patties, Make Homemade French Fries, Add Cool Toppings & Crazy Buns! Decorate a Fabulous Table, Play Waiter in a Restaurant & Eat ‘em! It’s the Burger Maker Crazy Chef! Kids get to play hamburger chef and make some homemade, fantastic burgers and french fries. With dozens of toppings and buns to choose from as well as sauces, cheeses, spices and condiments, this epic Burger Maker Crazy Chef app is fabulous! Choose your hamburger meat and grind it up. Then add spices and special ingredients to flavor your patty. Every hamburger needs some french fries, so we’re gonna get busy with some homemade french fries! Chop up the potatoes and pick your shape - funny faces, crinkly or zig zag - you choose. Now it’s time to flip & fry your hamburger patty, but be careful not to burn the burger! A happy face will appear when it’s perfectly cooked. After the hamburger is ready, kids will make a batch of fantastic french fries. Then it’s time to choose from 30 buns for the burger - silly faces, cool designs and crazy shapes makes these buns super special. Sauce up the hamburger with loads of options. And choose from several drinks. Getting hungry? Well, you’ve come to the right place! Kids will serve up yummy food at a restaurant. Get ready to feed kid customers at the restaurant and some dudes waiting in a car. Make sure you wipe their faces, burgers can be messy! You can also gobble up your own hamburger. What’s Inside Burger Maker Crazy Chef: ✔ Make burgers from scratch, grind up the meat, add & mix the ingredients and make into patties ✔ Choose from 10 toppings ✔ 5 types of sauces ✔ A Crazy Chef Happy Face thermometer tells you when your burger is ready ✔ More than 20 awesome burger buns including a cat face, alien, and robot ✔ Set a fancy table to eat your burger: 6 types of drinks, a dozen plates, more than two dozen napkins, 17 glasses, 29 toys and more! Features inside Burger Maker Crazy Chef ✔ Grind up the meat ✔ Chop up the potatoes for french fries in a machine by tapping a finger ✔ Touch & drag to mix up the ingredients for the burger ✔ Paint feature - Spread sauces, including ketchup and mustard by moving your finger - like painting! ✔ Put the hamburger on the fryer and flip until the Happy Face thermometer says it’s done - cook both sides! ✔ Move the potatoes around in the deep fryer for perfect french fries ✔ Turn on & off all the devices - the fryer, potato chopper, the grinder ✔ Watch ice added to your beverage ✔ Restart button to eat your burger over & over again The Burger Maker Crazy Chef app is an awesome way to get kids in the kitchen and interested in cooking. ABOUT TabTale: With over 500 million downloads and growing, TabTale has established itself as the creator of pioneering virtual adventures that kids and parents love. description: We must take care of a mermaid because it feels good, not fed, not washed, not living in a good place and not very well maintained. To do this we need someone, and in this game you will be the person who will handle the siren. First you have to clean the whole room siren as it is very dirty and we do not want this. Then he must add a few decorative elements around the room to look even more beautiful. Then you have to wash the siren, we will apply a layer of shampoo then we rinse with water, and we will cut a bit of hair and tail. After that you have to feed the little mermaid because its hungry. After I fed her, we have to arrange. So we will find a dress, we will make the hair, we make up and we will pick a few accessories to look great and to be the most beautiful mermaid. Thank you for choosing this game and invite you to choose and other games for girls in this developer to test your skills in this type of game. Instructions: Use your fingers to play

This application for probability is a great work from a team of teachers and educators.here we tried our best efforts to includes almost all topics of probability and basics of random process. This time probability tutorials also added with this application. Best to learn the topics of probabilities such as PROBABILITYINTRODUCTION, DETERMINISTIC EXPERIMENT, PROBABILISTIC OR RANDOM EXPERIMENT, CLASSICAL APPROACH TO PROBABILITY,TRIAL AND ELEMENTARY EVENTS, COMPOUND EVENTS,EXHAUSTIC NUMBER OF CASES,MUTUALLY EXCLUSIVE EVENTS, EQUALLY LIKELY EVENTS,FAVOURABLE NUMBER OF CASES,INDEPENDENT EVENTS,CLASSICAL DEFINITION OF PROBABILITY OF AN EVENT,AXIOMATIC APPROACH TO PROBABILITY,SAMPLE SPACE,EVENT,ELEMENTARY EVENTS,COMPOUND EVENTS,IMPOSSIBLE AND CERTAIN EVENTS,OCCURRENCE OR HAPPENING OF AN EVENT,MUTUALLY EXCLUSIVE EVENTS,MUTUALLY EXCLUSIVE AND EXHAUSTIVE SYSTEM OF EVENTS,FAVOURABLE EVENTS,AXIOMATIC DEFINITION OF PROBABILITY,ADDITION THEOREMS ON PROBABILITY,CONDITIONAL PROBABILITY,MULTIPLICATION THEOREMS ON PROBABILITY, INDEPENDENT EVENTS, MULTIPLICATON THEOREM FOR INDEPENDENT EVENTS, ADDITION THEOREM FOR INDEPENDENT EVENTS, THE LAW OF TOTAL PROBABILITY, BAYE’S RULE, RANDOM VARIABLE AND ITS PROBABILITY DISTRIBUTION, RANDOM VARIABLE, BINOMIAL DISTRIBUTION, MEAN AND VARIANCE OF BINOMIAL DISTRIBUTION, MEAN OF BINOMIAL DISTRIBUTION, VARIANCE OF BINOMIAL DISTRIBUTION, RELATION BETWEEN MEAN AND VARIANCE.

description: Everything is timed to perfection with the Runtastic Timer app - the practical, simple and easy-to-use interval timer app with voice feedback. The Runtastic Timer app is more than a stopwatch or countdown clock. Whether it’s for your HIIT workouts, circuit training or at-home bodyweight training workouts, this app is for you. Set as many timers on your smartphone as you desire, save these settings, and use your customised timers again and again. Define your workout intervals (workout, rest periods, sets, reps) and construct unique, personalised workouts! APP FEATURES & BENEFITS: * Customise your timer with various activity phases: - Workout - Rest period - Reps - Sets * Voice feedback: Constantly looking at your smartphone and clock is a problem of the past * Create an infinite number of timers, save them, and use these again and again * Determine sets of workout phases and rest periods, and how often you want to repeat your routine * Displays both total time and remaining time Use our timer app for training at the gym, with weights, kettle bells, spinning, bodyweight exercises, CrossFit or other fitness activities! The Runtastic Timer app is also a great fit for those engaging in HIIT (High Intensity Interval Training) training, interval training, or boot camp style circuit training! The countdown is on! Download the practical Runtastic Timer app today, and enjoy the unique timing benefits during fitness activities and in your everyday life!

This tip calculator allows you type in the bill amount and it automatically calculates the tip amount for a %10 %15 and %20 tip, with no other action required. Additionally you can enter the number of diners and the amount owed by each diner is calculated. There is also a slider that allows you to manually set a tip percentage on the fly and again the per person amount is calculated.

Sometimes life is tough. Sometimes we feel lost and alone. Sometimes we just need to surround ourselves with images that match our feelings. The wallpapers in this app won't try in vain to cheer you up or make you just like everyone else. The somber black and white pictures and words in these apps reflect the pain and loneliness of human existence. If you're feeling emo, why hide it? Go ahead, surround yourself with music, art and expression that show your feelings. Download this app to gain access to beautiful, chilling backgrounds that will reflect your true emotions.

description: Something strange is happening in the forest. Meet Nettle, Petal, and Ember, best friends and teenage forest fairies. Living in the Enchanted Glade, it’s their job to protect all the creatures, big and small, that dwell within. But a mysterious spell has covered the forest in bubbles. Fairies can’t fly with bubbles in their eyes! So what’s a girl to do? Save the day, of course! Fly through the air to help Nettle and her friends clear the way by popping bubbles with cute pixie magic. Nothing’s going to stop these sprites from saving the Enchanted Glade! Fairy Pop combines quick-paced dodging and shooting with adorable cartoon graphics. So grab your wand and get ready to enter a whole new magical world of enchantment. Fairy power! Features: - Frolic through a magical forest filled with many new friends! - Collect coins to unlock new characters - Fly and pop to fun pixie music - Enjoy simple and addictive gameplay: touch the left side of the screen to go up and the right side to pop bubbles

The Killer Whale Spyhop Sticker is a beautiful way to decorate your homescreen. Stickers (sometimes also referred to as magnets) are nice widgets to place images on your background. Simple and beautiful. Please check out our collection of stickers/magnets. This sticker is available in the sizes 2x2, 3x3 and 4x4. All are installed with this package. You will receive all three sizes by downloading. HOW TO INSTALL Please remember that this is a widget, not a normal app. It will not show in the app drawer. In order to place it on the home screen, tap and hold an empty space on the home screen and select widgets. The sticker (or magnet) will be in the widget list, select it in order to place it. The widget menu is often also located in the personalization menu. Can’t find your ultimate sticker or magnet in the market yet? Do you have any other comments or ideas? Please contact us at info@orcraphics.biz . Please also report bugs and issues here. We will try to fix it immediately. Depending on how complex the issue is, we strive to fix any bugs within 24 hours. Thank you. Enjoy your Killer Whale Spyhop Sticker Widget and have a look at our other stickers/magnets. This app is part of the intellectual property of Orcraphics. Unauthorized use or reselling can lead to legal action.

Knit Knacks helps you keep track of your knitting projects and display the results. Keep notes and pictures of your projects on a step to step basis and share the results with friends using Facebook integration. Includes a row counter to keep track of where you are and a gallery to display photos of all your projects together. Especially good for large projects and knitting groups because you can share the progress without having to take a large project with you.

description: Don't just watch the news, be part of shaping it. HuffPost Live is a live-streaming video network that lets you be part of the conversation. HuffPost Live is a live-streaming video network that uses the most engaging stories on The Huffington Post as the jumping-off point for real-time conversations and commentary – and invites viewers to join the discussion as on-air guests. Topics range from current events to entertainment to tech to parenting to health and fitness. If you have a comment or need support, please contact aolon.apps@teamaol.com .

description: TabletSearch is an Android app for tablet and in-app search. It provides the tablet and in-app search functionality that got removed from Google Search in Android 4.4 (KITKAT). Its major target devices are tablets and phones with Android 4.4, but can also be used on older Android versions. User feedback: We would love to hear from you, please send feedback and feature requests to us by email (devel [a] acadoid.com). If you encounter a problem with the app, please email us and we will do our very best to fix it quickly. Easy file sharing without internet or Bluetooth connection. FileBeam is a free app that allows you to send your photos, videos, ringtones or any other types of files to another device wirelessly without using the internet or a Bluetooth connection. It works perfect on the go. You can use FileBeam anywhere; at a camping place, on the train, or even on an airplane. Features: ※ Easy file-sharing - File sharing in just a few simple steps - Device connections without a complicated pairing procedure - Instant access to all features of the app. No registration required. ※ Be together anywhere - Exchange of files even at internet restricted areas such as camp sites, or planes. - Multitasking while file sharing occurs in the background - Pause/resume of downloads Tested on: Samsung: Galaxy S3, Galaxy Note2, Galaxy Note 8, Galaxy Note 10.0, Galaxy Tab 3, Galaxy Nexus, Galaxy S2_HD_LTE LG: Optimus G, Optimus LTE 2, Optimus G Pro, Optimus LTE3, Vu3, G2 Pantech: Vega R3, Vega Iron, Working on: Samsung: Galaxy R style, Galaxy S2 LTE Pantech: Vega Racer 2, Vega S5 Compatibility: - compatible with Jelly Bean, Android 4.1 and above. - since FileBeam doesn't use data network, the devices must be nearby. Babymecum es la aplicación para consultar medicación pediátrica nº1 en España para iPhone/iPad, con más de 75.000 descargas, y más de 500 valoraciones de usuarios (tanto padres como médicos), con una media de 4.5/5 puntos. Esta aplicación es una herramienta con la que puede consultar rápidamente la dosis de la mayoría de la medicación pediátrica de uso común. Tan solo tiene que introducir el peso de su hijo y Babymecum calculará por usted la dosis de los siguientes medicamentos. Antitérmicos: - Apiretal - Dalsy - Junifen2% - Junifen 4% - Febrectal supositorios lactances e infantiles - Nolotil supositorios infantiles Antibioticos: - Augmentine - Clamoxyl - Denvar - Klacid - Pantomicina Forte - Zinnat - Zitromax Antitusígenos: - Dastosin - Flutox - Levotuus - Romilar Jarabe - Sekisan - Toseina - Diminex Supositorios lactantes e infantiles. Y muchos más: - Actithiol - Aerius - Aerored gotas - Atarax - Flumil 2% - Paidoterin descongestivo - Polaramine Babymecum constituye una herramienta indispensable tanto para padres como para profesionales sanitarios. Babymecum está supervisado por pediatras con amplia experiencia en pediatría extrahospitalaria. Nota: Esta aplicación no sustituye el criterio médico de su pediatra. Toda medicación administrada a su hijo debe ser prescrita y supervisada por su pediatra. Babymecum is the application to query pediatric medication # 1 in Spain for iPhone / iPad, with over 75,000 downloads and more than 500 user reviews (both parents and physicians), with an average of 4.5 / 5 points. This application is a tool that can quickly check the dose most commonly used pediatric medications. You just have to enter the weight of your child and you Babymecum calculated by the dose of these medicines. Antipyretics: - Apiretal - Dalsy - Junifen2% - 4% Junifen - Febrectal lactances suppositories and children - Nolotil infant suppositories Antibiotics: - Augmentin - Clamoxyl - Denvar - Klacid - Forte Pantomicina - Zinnat - Zithromax Antitussives - Dastosin - Flutox - Levotuus - Romilar Syrup - Sekisan - Toseina - Suppositories Diminex infants and children. And many more: - Actithiol - Aerius - Aerored drops - Atarax - Flumil 2% - Paidoterin decongestant - Polaramine Babymecum is an indispensable tool for both parents and health professionals. Babymecum is supervised by pediatricians with extensive experience in outpatient pediatrics. Note: This application does not replace the clinical judgment of your doctor. All medications administered to your child should be prescribed and monitored by your pediatrician.

With detailed information of around 10 museums and 40 featured attractions along with 1000s of other Points of Interest carefully integrated with every single travel activity, Glasgow travel is power packed with utilities and information. From Facebook Check-Ins to local event information, offline map to intuitive Augmented Reality experience, we have brought most of the travel activities and application needs to one single app. Save precious travel time rather than switching between several apps and utilities! • Practical travel guide with detailed information like attractions, getting around for each district of Glasgow City. • Travel utilities like hotel booking, currency converter, weather forecast, world clocks, reminder, alarm and many more available within the app. • Intuitive, easy-to-use one tap pane interface with tight social network integration for Check-Ins, photo sharing and places review. • Just one app for all your devices with dedicated UI and data sync capabilities. • Plan your itinerary and port your activity data between different devices and social network using our pangeaguides.com website. • Community sharing experience for your photos, reviews and travel memories with your friends and other fellow travelers. Premium features of Glasgow Travel Guide bring exclusive travel utilities that reduce travel planning hassles and make the experience fun and memorable. Premium features consists of - • A next generation modern marvel Augmented Reality experience that brings surrounded by wonders feeling. • Search for cafes, restaurants, theatres and even hospitals with carefully organized location data. Find more than 1000 Points of Interest around you and get directions to places of your interest. • Extremely detailed Glasgow offline map for no connectivity areas or internet availability (Connection required on first time use). • Comprehensive set of utilities and tools that will help you plan your trip. Organize checklist, send postcards, bringing a collection of useful travel apps within a single app. • Discover people, places and culture with information about upcoming local events. Designed and developed by the travelers, for the travelers that works in all parallel universe!

** Free version is ad supported ** A simple and straightforward flash card maker / creator, designed with ease of use, simplicity, and clean design in mind. Features: - Backup/restore database of cards for easy transfer between devices - Allows for images via Camera, Gallery, or create your own using the built in sketch feature. - Mark cards as known after memorizing them - Sort cards alphabetically, by creation, modification, pending, complete - Timer - Record / attach audio files Usage: To begin, first create a new deck of cards by hitting the pencil icon in the upper right of the title bar. Next, be sure to give the deck a meaningful name for easy reference. You can edit and delete decks via long pressing on them. Once the deck is created you can begin making cards. To make a card, select the desired deck from the main screen. This will bring you to a new screen. Similar to deck creation, select the pencil icon in the top right. This will bring you to a new screen where you can input the question, answer, and if you like a picture. Hit the check mark in the upper right to save the card. To view a card or cards select the deck and then the card where you would like to begin. You can use the left and right arrow icons in the title bar to navigate between cards. To view the answer of a question, press anywhere on the card to display the answer. If you like, you can use the "x" and check mark icons beneath a card to mark a card as completed or not. This is totally optional but helps you keep track of what you need to know and what you already know. You can edit,delete,mark status of cards by long pressing them from listing screen. To sort through cards or decks you can select the gear icon in the upper left of the title bar. To backup/restore, reset cards decks, you can find these options in the menu.
release_text: * You can now use an image as an answer * Various layout updates that displays more useful info

Live wallpaper - scrolling panorama of Prague (Czech Republic) on the screen of your phone or tablet! Day and night is changing dynamically, lights in windows are turning on and off at night. All panorama images were captured by the author himself. Application is completely free and contains no advertisements or viruses. Key features of this application: ● It contains no advertisements of any kind ● No system permission is required ● Careful usage of the battery of your device ● It can be moved to the SD card of your device ● Panorama image size is more than 24 megapixels ● Images are crystal-sharp even on Full HD screens (1920 by 1200 pixels) ● Tablets (pads) and devices with non-standard screen proportions are fully supported ● Panorama scroling speed is adjustable ● Various day and night cycle settings (disabled, fast/slow, by device time) ● Selectable time of day (midnight, morning, midday, evening) ● Night illumination is adjustable (disabled, all lights, random lights) ● Top and bottom image margins are adjustable License check will be performed only once. This is a full version. It has no limitations.

Did you ever have to book a meeting when you were on the run but couldn’t see the availabilities of your attendees or conference rooms? Well booking meetings with Outlook just got better with our BookMeeting mobile app! You can now quickly book a meeting when on-the-go by selecting your attendees, location and confirming their availabilities without delay. No more rescheduled meetings because of lack of availability info! Main features of Book Meeting: • Connect to Outlook exchange server to check a contact or location’s availability • Add, delete or modify a list of contacts • Add, delete or modify meeting details (meeting subject, time, and description) Workflow: • Add your exchange details in settings • Add contacts you want to use • Check contacts for meeting from the list and click check • Choose a time slot and go.

You like beers and you want to keep a trace of all beers that you had drunk in order to recognize them easily? You have a little or big beer cellar and you need a tool to manage it? You like to share your last favorite beer with your friends? So, this app is made for you ! That’s what you can do with it : - You can scan bottles and cans that you have drunk in order to find them easily after. Or you can scan all bottles of your beer cellar in order to manage it. Or both… - You can also sort your beers by name, bar code, category, rating, container (bottles, can), brewer, land and do a search by using same critera. - If you taste a good beer in a restaurant of at friends, scan it ! Then you can recognize it easily. - You can also export your list of beers on a SD card - You can send your beer list by mail and open it in an excel sheet. - In order to recognize beers that you have, you can take a picture of the bottle or can. - You can create custom items in the reports and manage your drop-downs. - You can translate the app in your language by yourself. -You can bulk scan your beers -You can synchronize your list between multiple devices - Finally, to manage better your list or your cellar, you can rate every beer that you have drink and share these ratings with other users. Visit our website for more information: http://www.cameldroid.com
release_text: - You can translate the app in your language by yourself. - You can create custom items in the reports and manage your drop-downs.

description: *** This app requires a device that supports stylus pen input like Galaxy Note Series with S-Pen*** *** Additional server program(can be downloaded from http://www.sunnysidesoft.com/virtualtablet ) should be running on your PC(support both Windows & Mac) to start this app*** ** VirtualTablet Lite version with AD is also available in store ** ** You can buy the full version of VirtualTablet with no Ad in the store ** Turn your tablet device into wireless digitizer! Run this app on the tablet device with stylus pen support. If VirtualTablet Server program is running on your PC, you can seamlessly transfer your input to your PC like you use real digitizer H/W. You can download the VirtualTablet Server program free of charge from http://www.sunnysidesoft.com/virtualtablet You don't need to buy real digitizer (such as Wacom Tablet) for your desktop anymore. [Things You Can Do with this App] - Make a hand writing annotation on your PC's PDF viewer. - Sketch with your stylus pen on canvas of any painter applications in your PC. Enjoy drawing with pencil and brush tools using your stylus! (Pressure sensitive drawing application like SketchBook Pro is required). - Remotely control your PC with stylus pen (same as remote mouse).

A good laugh is sunshine in the house! Funny SMS Ringtones & Sounds app is one of the best things to make your day. You don’t need to listen to funny jokes every day to be in a good mood. It’s amazing how small things like a funny sms tone can do a lot to make your day. Funny SMS Ringtones & Sounds is an application with the collection of carefully picked weird sounds to set as an sms tone. In this funny soundboard you can find hilarious animal sounds, funny singing, kids’ sounds and other crazy things to set as text message ringtone. Cool features ========== - Set as sms text ringtone - Set timer as a fake sms - Set widget button of favorite sounds on your phone home screen Laughing is a reaction to certain stimuli. It may ensue from hearing a joke, being tickled, or other stimuli. Most commonly, it is considered a visual expression of a number of positive emotional states, such as joy, mirth, happiness, relief, etc. However, on some occasions it may express other emotions, such as embarrassment, apology or confusion ("nervous laughter") or courtesy laugh. Laughter not only provides a full-scale workout for your muscles, it unleashes a rush of stress-busting endorphins. What's more, your body can't distinguish between real and fake laughter - any giggle will do. We need to laugh more and seek stress reducing humor in our everyday lives. Laughter is the human gift for coping and for survival. The power of laughter is unleashed every time we laugh. In today's stressful world, we need to laugh much more. Legal info: ========= Sound clips used in Funny SMS Ringtones & Sounds app are under public domain license and/or Creative Commons’ license. App design and code copyright Best Ringtones Apps - 2014.

NaVlak je aplikace a widget pro zobrazování nádražních informačních tabulí s aktuálními informacemi o odjezdech a příjezdech vlaků. Aplikace umožňuje zobrazit vlaky POUZE Z VYBRANÝCH ČESKÝCH STANIC (více viz *). NaVlak zobrazuje následující údaje: - Typ a číslo vlaku - Cílová resp. počáteční stanice - Směr jízdy - Čas odjezdu resp. příjezdu - Číslo nástupiště a koleje - Zpoždění - Informační poznámky vybrané stanice NaVlak také obsahuje widget, který je možné umístit na plochu a mít tak odjezdy ze své stanice vždy okamžitě po ruce. Widget při změně aktuální GPS pozice automaticky vybírá zobrazovanou stanici z oblíbených (lze vypnout v nastavení). Vlastníkem aplikace NaVlak je CHAPS spol s r.o., data pro aplikaci poskytuje SŽDC - Správce železniční dopravní cesty. * Aplikace umožňuje zobrazovat informační tabule z necelých čtyř set českých nádraží, které jsou vybaveny moderním informačním systémem a které lze zobrazit na stránkách www.szdc.cz, odkud aplikace čerpá data. Seznam dostupných stanic je zde: http://provoz.szdc.cz/tabule/ Z tohoto důvodu nelze zobrazit informace z ostatních českých nádraží, děkujeme za pochopení. NaVlak application is a widget for viewing of station information boards with current information on departures and arrivals of trains. The application allows you to view trains ONLY SELECTED STATIONS CZECH (see *). NaVlak displays the following: - Type and number of the train - Target respectively. origination station - Direction of movement - Departure time respectively. arrival - The number of platforms and tracks - Delay - Information note of the selected station NaVlak also includes a widget that can be placed on the desktop and have such departures from his station always immediately at hand. Widget to change the current GPS position automatically selects the displayed station from favorites (can be disabled in settings). This app helps you to align your parallactic telescope mount toward the celestial pole, using the numeric Scheiner method given by Dr. M. Knülle, 2000. Make a quick measurement, calculate the correction value and adjust your mount sufficient for long-time photographic exposures! For the alignment measure the drift of a star with a scaled eyepiece in arbitrary units during a certain time and correct your mount according to the calculation. Start with the meridian adjustment, observing a star near the meridian in the south with a minimal elevation of about 45 deg. For obtaining the declination, place your phone flat on the telescope tube, pointing its top side to the star. Then align the polar elevation, observing a rising star in the east or a setting star in the west. For correction, select a star near the meridian in the south. For more info see http://leq.one-arcsec.org or www.strickling.net/aufstell.htm (German language) Key words: Astronomy, telescope mount, parallactic mount, equatorial mount, astrophotography, Scheiner, numeric, quick, fast, easy, adjustment, adjusting,

Engelsk-Svensk Ordbok Offline. Offline English-Swedish Dictionary. * Over 35.000 words and expressions * Bookmark your favorite translations for fast reference * Works offline! No internet connection needed! The perfect translator for your trips or when no data connection is available * Listen to the correct pronunciation in British or American English and Swedish (if installed) using Android's built-in Text-to-speech synthesizer. * Share translations by SMS, email, etc. This version is supported by ads. If you like the application, please consider upgrading to the ad-free version to support the development. Thanks :) FAQ: Q: How can I share a translation? A: Just press 2-3 seconds over the translation and you will be presented with a menu with all available sharing options based on the apps installed in your device (Email, SMS, etc) Q: How can I change the speed of the voice? A: The speed of the speech is controlled by the TTS engine installed with Android. It can be set up by going to: Settings --> Voice input & output settings --> Text to speech settings --> speech rate Q: How can I change the speech language? A: Just go to Menu --> Settings and select the language. Currently, 3 languages are available: * English (US) * English (GB) * Swedish (if installed) DISCLAIMER: The text-to-speech (TTS) technology may not be available in some devices. To check if your phone is able of speech synthesis: Menu -> Settings -> Voice input & output -> Text-to-speech settings. If not installed, your device may ask you to install the TTS engine. An internet connection may be required. We recommend installing it before traveling as roaming data tariffs may be very expensive.

Now you can have a guided tour in Gothenburg whenever you like. And the only thing you have to pay for is a tram ticket. This is how it works: The app guides you to the nearest tram stop and selects a suitable route and departure. Once you get on, the sightseeing begins. All tours go along a preset route and take less than an hour. You get all the information read to you in your headphones. All you have to do is sit down and look out the window. (And change tram when the voice tells you to, of course ...). All tours end at the same stop they start from. Features: - A voice tells you about the sights that pass outside the tram window. - You get clear instructions about what tram you should get on and change to. - If you don’t have a ticket, the app can help with this too. Firstly, by informing you about suitable tickets, partly by guiding you to the nearest ticket seller. - After the tour you can share your experience on Facebook. - The app speaks both Swedish and English. Have a great trip!

This intuitive and feature rich finite element app is especially useful for civil engineers, mechanical engineers, architects and students who wish to design 2D frames. You can input and edit hyper static structures, forces, supports etc both graphically and textually. The calculations are performed immediately. Main features are: ✓ F, T and q (rectangular and triangular) loads ✓ Fixed and hinge connections at beam ends ✓ Moment, Shear, Stress, Deflection, Reaction forces and Unity checks ✓ Imposed deflections ✓ M, N, V, ux, uz, utot, phi, sigma and unity checks output ✓ Fixed, hinge and roller supports in any direction ✓ Load cases and load combinations, including safety factors ✓ Profile groups; each group can have its own color ✓ Import any steel profile or general section from our free Engineering Libraries (EU, UK, AU, US & CA profiles) ✓ Import dxf files ✓ Export to our Concrete Design and Steel Design apps ✓ Share picture ✓ Snap points ✓ Undo function ✓ Annotations ✓ Formulas ✓ Multi copy ✓ Scale entire structure ✓ Trim/extend ✓ Automatic dimension lines (Autocad look) ✓ Element and node numbers ✓ Both graphical and textual edit modes ✓ Metric & Imperial units ✓ Multitouch zoom (pinch zooming) ✓ Many options for showing/hiding items ✓ Options to set almost all colors in the app ✓ Dark and light theme ✓ Available in 10 Languages ✓ Save your structures in the cloud (CloudConstruct) ✓ Built-in simple scientific calculator ✓ Wobbly effect Want to be part of the cutting edge FrameDesign developments? Visit https://plus.google.com/communities/117931041280190587153 to become Beta Tester. There is a web version of FrameDesign as well! Visit framedesign.letsconstruct.nl.

description: An extrasolar planet catalog and reference guide. An extrasolar planet (or exoplanet) is a planet that is outside our solar system. These planets orbit other stars. The first exoplanets were discovered in the mid 1990's, but exoplanet hunting began in earnest only recently. This catalog is kept up-to-date with the current count of exoplanets, all the latest data for each exoplanet, and the data for every parent star. With the home screen widget, watch the exoplanet count skyrocket in the coming months as new data become available. The count at the moment is just above 500. The count by 2012 could approach 1000! Watch each new exoplanet's mass, radius, and period trend toward that of our very own Earth. Soon astronomers will find exoplanets resembling Earth in many ways!

description: Heartland Hunters is proud to offer you What the Hunt Kansas NOTE: If you're not happy with the App, please contact us! We're finding some are leaving negative feedback without understanding how to use the App! If you press "See All Game" from inside the app you'll see every species listed. Some of these will contain dates from a prior season as a reference. As soon as the new dates have been published we will be making the appropriate updates. See the Kansas hunting seasons at a glance, organized by date OR by game. Also, get sunrise and sunset times for any date in the future! Have you ever been turned around on the KDWPT website while trying to find out what you can hunt on a certain day but find that the site is organized according to species? We've turned that on its head and allow you to select your date and we'll show you what is available to hunt that day. Plan your vacations, see what is available to hunt this upcoming weekend, or check it while in the woods! Internet access is not required to use the app, just to download the periodic updates. The App also includes Sunrise/Sunset times based on your GPS location and helpful links to the KDWPT website. Each version of the app will get you access to 1 year of updates. At the end of the year your data will NOT disappear. So if you purchase the 2013 version of the app then on 01/01/2014 your app will stop downloading updates but you will still see all published dates in 2013. Whether you hunt deer, ducks, turkey, or anything else- this App will help keep you on track! This app is not endorsed by the KDWPT.

Aplikasi Islam Menjawab adalah aplikasi Islami untuk pengguna Android yang menyajikan kumpulan tanya - jawab seputar permasalahan dikehidupan sehari-hari kita. Jawaban atas pertanyaan tersebut dipaparkan secara jelas dan ilmiah berlandaskan pada Al Qur'an dan sunnah sesuai dengan pemahaman para sahabat dan tambahan keterangan dari para Ulama Ahlussunnah Waljama'ah. Ada kurang lebih 2200-an tanya - jawab yang telah kami kumpulkan dalam aplikasi ini. Tanya-jawab tersebut kami peroleh dari berbagai sumber tanya-jawab yang ada di internet. Sumber dari tanya-jawab tersebut kami sebutkan dibagian akhir pada setiap artikel, termasuk juga yang menjawab dari pertanyaannya. Metode kami dalam pengumpulan artikel tanya-jawab adalah dengan merujuk kepada website-website yang sudah dikenal dengan baik kredibilitasnya baik itu dalam tataran keilmuan maupun keilmiahannya. Sehingga Anda tidak perlu khawatir/ragu, InsyaAllah artikel-artikel yang kami sajikan bisa dijadikan rujukan untuk mendapatkan jawaban seputar permasalah sehari-hari yang ada disekitar kita atau bisa juga dijadikan sebagai wahana penuntut ilmu disela-sela kesibukan kita. Aplikasi ini merupakan aplikasi offline sehingga Anda tidak perlu membutuhkan koneksi internet ketika membaca artikel karena semua artikel telah kami instal di perangkat mobile Anda. Semoga Anda bisa mendapatkan banyak manfaat dan faedah ilmu dengan adanya aplikasi ini. Aplikasi ini dikembangkan oleh komunitas mahasiswa muslim di Surabaya. Anda dapat mengkases informasi mengenai komunitas kami di : http://infodakwah.net http://fsms.or.id http://assunnahsurabaya.wordpress.com dan didukung oleh : Ristek Muslim http://ristekmuslim.com Anda dapat memberikan ide, saran, dan dana infaq pengembangan untuk aplikasi ini / aplikasi dengan konten islami lainnya melalui : Email : android@ristekmuslim.com Facebook : http://facebook.com/RistekMuslim Twitter : http://twitter.com/RistekMuslim Semoga Allah menjadikan upaya ini sebagai amalan shalih yang bermanfaat pada hari yang tidak lagi bermanfaat harta dan anak-anak, melainkan orang yang menemui Rabb-nya dengan amalan shalih. Jazakumullahu khairan Tim Ristek Muslim - Android Ristek Muslim | 2012 #Bagi yang mendapati error saat instalasi mohon menghubungi kami, agar kami bisa melakukan review dan membantu memberikan solusinya.

Green Wings is an addictive minigame in which you take control of a bird which is flying through a forest. Using very simple controls (tap on the left side of the screen to flap, press on the right side of the screen to dive), you'll have to avoid tree-like obstacles and collect apples to increase your score. Let the fun begin!

THIS GAME IS FUNNY! Your toddlers and babies will love this fireworks game. This game is very funny for the preschool children. When they have played for the first time, your todddlers and babies may not be able to correctly touch the moving balloons with his/her little hands. Play the "Fireworks Balloon Pop" game with your baby continuously for a few hours or days, and you will be surprised at the mobile development of your baby's hands. "Fireworks Balloon Pop" game must be played in the presence of parents, and it is encouraged for you to guide your baby through the game for a few days at first. WHEN TO PLAY! When your baby is hungry or will not stop crying, playing this game can hold your baby's attention. (The various sounds, animated shapes stimulate your baby's curiosity.) This game is exceptionally handy for mothers and fathers who spend time with their babies but cannot figure out how to spend that time usefully. This game may be too advanced for infants under 6 months old. CAUTION! Playing the application too much or leaving the children alone with the mobile phone or tablet pc is not encouraged. Please feel free to notify us! Thank You...
If you need to send a message to someone special but lack inspiration, we have the solution! This application contains a lot of messages that will surely please those who receive them.

Calculate when your train is departing, where you have to change train. If you are a tourist and do not have internet abroad, don't worry, you won't need Internet to use Metro Valencia Offline, because is offline! You can see all the metro stations in the map, click on them, find nearby stations, search by text... Will be very easy to move with the metro in Valencia. And the quick history makes very easy choose the most common routes that you use. Now, you can check the remaining travels in your metro card. A card can be add typing or scanned by NFC. Then when you calculate a route, the app will show you which cards have enough travels to be used.
release_text: -Interface redesing -New and faster calculation algorithm -Check trips of your metro cards -New stations and lines added -Bug fixes -Bookmark routes -Report incidence

description: **This is a skin for Better Keyboard or Smart Keyboard .** **How to use** Install Better Keyboard or Smart Keyboard from the market-> Open Better Keyboard->Press Better Keyboard Skin -> choose skin and select it from the list.

Play the classic Hot Potato with your friends, up to 8 players. Response the random questions and pass the device before the time runs out. Play with common time or different time for each player. Hot Potato is not an AI, players must be honest!
release_text: Now you can change the game duration (very short, short, medium, long and very long)

description: «На Марсе продолжают искать жизнь», «Ученые близки к 3D-печати органов», «Роботы заменяют рабочих», «Запущено тестирование автономных автомобилей». Каждый день по всему миру публикуется более 1000 статей о новинках мира науки и техники, из которых наша редакция выбирает самые интересные и новаторские. На нашем ресурсе появляются ежедневные новости, статьи и обзоры про гаджеты, медицину, космос, робототехнику и 3d-печать. Товары нашего магазина Инноваций являются физическим воплощением новейших технологий. Пользуясь ими, Вы в полной мере сможете почувствовать себя человеком будущего, - ведь революционность идей и дизайнов не имеют аналогов в настоящем. Если вы боитесь, что ничего не поймете, у нас есть глоссарий! Он объяснит каждый непонятный термин, который встретится на страницах приложения. У нас Вы сможете проверить, насколько Вы готовы к миру будущего, пройдя тестирование на IQ, креативность и эмоциональный интеллект. И это только начало! Присоединяйтесь - будет интересно! "On Mars, continue to search for life", "Scientists are close to 3D-print of", "Robots replace workers", "Running testing autonomous vehicles." Every day around the world published more than 1,000 articles about the updates to the world of science and technology, of which our editorial staff selects the most interesting and innovative. On our website there are daily news, articles and reviews about gadgets, medicine, aerospace, robotics, and 3d-printing. The goods of our shop innovation is the physical embodiment of the latest technology. Using them, you can fully feel like a man of the future - for revolutionary ideas and designs are unique in this. If you are afraid, you do not understand that we have a glossary! He will explain every vague term which will meet on the pages of the application. Here you can check how much you are ready for the world of the future, having tested for IQ, creativity and emotional intelligence. And that's just the beginning! Join now - it will be interesting!
release_text: - Ключевые интерфейсы адаптированы под планшетную версию. Читайте новости и делайте покупки с планшета. - Рубрика «Акции». Здесь — все товары со скидкой. - Рубрикатор и поисковик в «Глоссарии». Искать термины стало удобнее. - Функция «Купить в один клик». Купить понравившийся товар стало совсем просто. О статусе заказа сообщит SMS. - Подраздел «Промокоды» в разделе «Бонусные баллы». Чтобы получить баллы, введите код. - Тест на скорость мышления. Устройте испытание интеллекту.

C.H.A.O.S - Combat Helicopter Assault Operation Simulator C.H.A.O.S - is your opportunity to go through the new military adventure in the sky, but in an even more rigorous and competitive environment. If you are an experienced pilot - test your fighting skills, fighting on the rigid rules of our tournaments with those who already have significant experience in the management of helicopter gunships. If you're new - prove that you are a rising star, or ... or fall from the sky. The motto of the CHAOS Combat Copterst: In the sky, there will be only one! Characteristics: - Prizes - Video of fighting for the analysis and preparation for combat available - 2 types of tournaments: regular (includes 3 leagues) and elite (for seasoned fighters) - The integration of games with Game Center and Facebook - Realistic helicopter simulator and game play, rich with action and events - Highly detailed helicopter models from leading manufacturers including the U.S., Russia and Europe (AH-64 "Apache", UH-60 "Black Hawk", MI-24 "Hind", Ka-52 "Alligator", RAH-66 "Comanche") and other - Unique visual and sound effects - Real maps and battle locations - 8 training missions, you can prepare for the air fight by passing training missions - Ability to improve performance and upgrade weapons for your helicopter - Medals and orders for the professionalism displayed in battle - Detailed statistics combat achievements, which is available both in game and on the website. The War never ends.Si vis pacem, para bellum is a Latin adage translated as, "If you wish for peace, prepare for war". 2 tons: missiles, rockets and guns - Use this tank killer killer Makes it rain hell. Add friends, participate in tournaments, improve combat skills in between tournaments in training missions and online battles, and win awards and titles. Detailed schedule of the tournaments can be found on the website or on http://chaos-game.com http://facebook.com/groups/chaosgame/ - watch the updates of the schedule.
release_text: • The new mode of team play • Fix critical bugs • New meetings, new friends and new enemies • New ideas for autumn game updates

description: Tout pour réussir votre examen du Code de la Route avec la MEILLEURE APPLI pour Android ! « Très complète, cette application fait réviser en profondeur et prépare l’examen théorique. » Le Figaro Vous souhaitez préparer l’examen du code de la route en mettant toutes les chances de votre côté ? Vous désirez simplement tester vos connaissances ? ...Auriez-vous à nouveau votre code si vous le repassiez aujourd’hui ? Découvrez Le Code de la Route, LA solution pour vous entraîner comme à l’auto-école ! Idéale pour apprendre, s’exercer et se perfectionner, cette formation interactive exploite toutes les possibilités de votre smartphone Android (zoom sur images, leçons vidéo, commentaires audio, etc.). Avec Le Code de la Route, mettez toutes les chances de votre côté : • Cours clairs et détaillés, 100% conformes à l'examen officiel et réalisés par des professionnels de la formation routière • Questions lues et réponses commentées et illustrées, grâce à une interface intuitive et dynamique • Correction renforcée accompagnée de photos et de commentaires, pour une meilleure compréhension des situations • Suivi de progression complet pour travailler librement vos points faibles (statistiques par thème, résultats aux examens) • Mettez-vous dans les conditions réelles de l’examen final en répondant aux questions dans un temps limité ! Retrouvez tous les outils pour une formation réussie : - Présentation détaillée de TOUS les panneaux de signalisation - 6 modules de révision par thème, regroupant 200 questions - 8 examens blancs de 40 questions chronométrées - 93 vidéos de formation classées en 6 thèmes (introduction, signalisation, conduite, circulation, véhicule et conducteur) - Historique des résultats pour visualiser facilement vos progrès *** Vu dans la presse *** « Idéal pour vous exercer, vous perfectionner mais également si vous souhaitez simplement tester vos connaissances et découvrir les nouveaux panneaux. » Mobiles Magazine « Cette appli permet de se préparer à valider l’examen du code de la route. […] Le prix est modique en regard du service apporté ! » Phone Mag « Le code de la route n’est jamais facile et des heures de révision s’imposent. Mais comme vous n’avez pas forcément le temps de vous coller devant un écran, l’application vous permet de vous déplacer tout en ayant ces précieuses leçons dans votre poche. Et, surprise, c’est une application d’excellente qualité avec de nombreuses options. » Mobiles Magazine /!\ Attention /!\ : Connexion WIFI fortement recommandée au premier lancement de l'application. All for a successful review of the Highway Code with the BEST APP for Android! "Very complete, this application is thoroughly revise and prepare the theoretical examination. " Le Figaro You want to prepare the review of the traffic by putting the odds on your side? You just want to test your knowledge? Would you ... your code again if you repassiez today? Discover The Highway Code, the solution to train like the driving school! Ideal to learn, practice and perfect, this interactive training leverages all the capabilities of your Android smartphone (zoom images, video lessons, audio commentary, etc..). With the Highway Code, put all the chances on your side: • clear and detailed lessons, 100% in accordance with the formal review by professional road training • read and commented answers Questions and illustrated through an intuitive and dynamic interface • Enhanced Correction including pictures and comments for a better understanding of situations • Monitoring progress of complete freedom to work your weaknesses (statistics by topic, exam results) • Put yourself in the actual conditions of the final exam by answering questions in a limited time! Find all the tools for a successful training: - Detailed presentation of ALL signs - Revision 6 modules by theme, involving 200 questions - 8 exams of 40 questions timed - 93 training videos divided into six themes (introduction, signaling, driving traffic, vehicle and driver) - Historical results to easily view your progress In the press *** *** "Ideal for practice, but also improve yourself if you just want to test your knowledge and discover new panels. " Mobile Magazine "This app allows you to prepare to validate the examination of traffic. [...] The price is low compared with the service provided! " Phone Mag "The traffic is never easy and hours of revision necessary. But as you do not necessarily have the time to stick to a screen, the application allows you to move while having these valuable lessons in your pocket. And, surprise, it is a high quality application with many options. " Mobile Magazine ! / \ Attention / \: WIFI highly recommended to first launch the application.
release_text: 1.2.1 - Correction de bugs mineurs 1.2 - Nouvelle interface - Nouveaux examens blancs - Optimisation de l'application - Correction de bugs mineurs

description: The Universe is in danger and needs a savior! Ride your spaceship and defend it. Clear all areas, use all dropped bonusses which are from dead enemies or projectiles when you need them. Defeat twin bosses and be savior! Your game will be Autosaved when you clicked main menu button which is on post level menu. So don't worry if you have to give a break. There is a Continue button on Main Menu to continue great adventure!
release_text: 1.2.0 Update -Some minor bugs fixed. -A new Bonus added. Destroy all enemies in the frame when you get it. -Enemy ships' speed 10% decreased. (except bosses)

description: This application is dedicate to Shirdi Sai Baba.Sai Baba of Shirdi was an Indian guru, yogi, and fakir who is regarded by his Hindu and Muslim devotees as a saint. Many Hindu devotees including Hemadpant who wrote the famous Shri Sai Satcharitra consider him an incarnation of Lord Krishna. Om sai namo namah jaap is dedicated for sai baba dhayan and meditation.

Don't get angry, get Revenge!!! The lumberjacks have invaded the beaver's home again. Now it is time to strike back and get ... Revenge!!! The beavers and their forest friends are out to teach the lumberjacks a lesson. You can fling a fish, launch a skunk, toss a rabbit and more!! Join over 1,000,000 players!!! Beaver's Revenge™ has hours of fun physics gameplay. Get ready to smash and destroy anything that gets in your way. FEATURES - Great 3D graphics - 5 varied worlds - 6 unique animals - 110 levels New Permission: The accounts permission has been added to pre-fill options during registration. If you like the game please rate it 5 stars (★★★★★). Email us at Support@twistedgames.com with your suggestions and comments. We love hearing your ideas and feedback! Like us on Facebook: http://www.facebook.com/TwistedGames Follow us on Twitter: http://twitter.com/twistedgames

Something strange is happening in the forest. Meet Nettle, Petal, and Ember, best friends and teenage forest fairies. Living in the Enchanted Glade, it’s their job to protect all the creatures, big and small, that dwell within. But a mysterious spell has covered the forest in bubbles. Fairies can’t fly with bubbles in their eyes! So what’s a girl to do? Save the day, of course! Fly through the air to help Nettle and her friends clear the way by popping bubbles with cute pixie magic. Nothing’s going to stop these sprites from saving the Enchanted Glade! Fairy Pop combines quick-paced dodging and shooting with adorable cartoon graphics. So grab your wand and get ready to enter a whole new magical world of enchantment. Fairy power! Features: - Frolic through a magical forest filled with many new friends! - Collect coins to unlock new characters - Fly and pop to fun pixie music - Enjoy simple and addictive gameplay: touch the left side of the screen to go up and the right side to pop bubbles

Animated planet Earth with live weather and satellite data. Imagery included: Climate Reanalyzer weather forecast - World GFS Precipation and Clouds (+48h) - World GFS Air Temperature (+48h) - World GFS Air Temperature Anomaly (+48h) - World GFS Precipitable Water (+48h) - World GFS Surface Wind Speed (+48h) - World GFS Jetstream Wind Speed (+48h) - World GFS Snow Depth (+48h) US Naval Research Laboratory, Marine Meteorology Division - World Rainrate (-24h, generated every 3h) METEOSAT 0 degree satellite - Airmass realtime imagery (-24h, generated every 1h) - Airmass realtime imagery full resolution (-6h, generated every 1h) - Multi-Sensor Precipitation Estimate (rain rate) (-24h, generated every 15min) - IR 10.8 (-24h, generated every 1h) METEOSAT IODC satellite - Multi-Sensor Precipitation Estimate (rain rate) (-24h, generated every 30min) NASA GOES satellite - Goes East Infrared (-24h, generated every 3h) - Goes West Infrared (-24h, generated every 3h) MTSAT satellite - Infrared (-24h, generated every 1h) SSEC - Infrared low res global composite (-1w, generated every 3h) - Water vapor low res global composite (-1w, generated every 3h) Application features: - Interpolation between images - Imagery selection from menu - Live Sun light - Bump mapping - Data cache for offline use - Double tap will stop/play animation - No Ads Copyright and credit CCI data has been obtained using Climate Reanalyzer ( http://cci-reanalyzer.org ), Climate Change Institute, University of Maine, USA. NRL DATA has been obtained using United States Naval Research Laboratory, Marine Meteorology Division ( http://www.nrlmry.navy.mil ) All METEOSAT images shown in the application are subject to EUMETSAT copyright. For all NASA GOES images credit to NOAA-NASA GOES Project. For all MTSAT images credit to Japan Meteorological Agency. For all SSEC images provided courtesy of University of Wisconsin-Madison Space Science and Engineering Center. For Xplanet cloudmap many thanks to Hari Nair author of Xplanet. Limitations On some devices application will not launch and crash report is seen. This is caused in most cases by low graphical card capabilities or low amount of memory of the target device. Application use OpenGL ES 2.0 and extensive pixel shader with multitexturing. Time of CCI data is sometimes shifted back by one day. For exact time always the time in the texture is relevant. Application is distributed as local image viewer which is accessing public available content from internet on behalf of user. Data are internally cached and only delta is downloaded. There is no guarantee for the availability of the downloaded data and the application also works without internet connectivity. Program is distributed in the hope that it will be useful, but WITHOUT ANY WARRANTY.

Nature HD by Photox Designs is a apex and nova theme inspired by some of the most beautiful natural environments. It includes over 150+ completely custom HD along with 20 HD wallpapers! Themed App icons are included for most popular apps, and unique folder icon. This theme will drive your wild and adventurous side to another level! Nature HD is compatible with both Apex and Nova Launcher. This theme is truly unique. * 20 HD Wallpapers * 150+ HD Icons (More to be added via incremental updates) * Compatible with both Apex and Nova Launchers. ===>Important tips: Open Nature HD App after installation and apply Apex Theme if you are using Apex Launcher or Apply Nova Theme if you are using Nova Launcher. You can also Apply Wallpapers from the app. This theme works with both Apex and Novalauncher. The weather widget on screen belongs to Palmury Weather.Search “ Palmury Weather “ on Play Store to install. Thank you for downloading our theme. Don't hesitate to email us if you have any problems, questions or suggestions. If you like the theme, please leave a positive review. Tokyo Subway Navigation for Tourists is a free application officially provided by Tokyo Metro Co., Ltd to enable users to search transfer information for the Tokyo Subway system (Tokyo Metro and Toei Subway). This application supports English, Chinese (Simplified & Traditional), Korean, Thai and Japanese. It is highly recommended for visitors sight-seeing in Tokyo. By simply touching the station names on the map, you can easily search for a route, or instead you can select your arrival and departure stations by using the landmark search functionality to search for the name of tourist spots such as Tokyo Tower or Senso-ji Temple or for the name of popular hotels. This application displays the main route, time required, and fares in a simple easy to understand format. Also because the application allows you to find the closest exit to landmarks near the station, you can stop worrying about navigating the huge number of subway exits, and simply relax and enjoy using the subway to sightsee around Tokyo. You can also use the application to check which stations offer a free Wi-Fi service. Make sightseeing in Tokyo convenient and pleasant! Try it today! Features 1. Can also be used offline. 2. Supports English, Chinese (Simplified & Traditional), Korean, Thai & Japanese. 3. Three ways to select your arrival and departure stations ・By touching the station name on the route map ・By selecting the station name based on nearby major tourist spots ・By entering the station name 4. Guides you to the best exit for nearby tourist spots. (Exit A1, B1 etc.) 5. Shows which stations offer free Wi-Fi. Note: ・When using Find Nearest Station (GPS function), please be aware that the current location may vary from actuality in the event of your device having a poor signal when inside a building etc. ・Fares and transfer information supplied are relevant only to routes on the Tokyo Metro and Toei Subway lines. In the event of service disruptions, there may be occasions when the route displayed in the search results cannot be accessed. ・The search is based on the average ride time. Times may vary from the actual timetable so please keep this in mind when using the service. ・The fare displayed is the fare to ride the train if you purchase a ticket. If you are using an IC Card, please check the fare. ・Functionality issues sometimes may occur due to the memory limitations of your device. In this event, please check your device’s memory and try again. ・In the event of a fare revision on the Tokyo Subway (Tokyo Metro or Toei Subway), please be aware that relevant updates to the application may occur slightly before or after the official enforcement date. System Requirements AndroidOS 4 and above *There may be functionality issues with certain devices.
release_text: • Supports Thai. • Improved landmark search functionality. • Improved stability.

description: Rabbit terror monster legend game is the cutest adventure game that will entertain you a lot! This funny game is the best remedy to cure your bad mood and melancholy! So if you’re ready to start the most amazing adventure in your life, then what are you waiting for? The clue to your eventful life is here – just press “install” and you won’t be able to tear yourself from this lovely Rabbit terror monster legend game! There’re a lot of cute and funny jumping rabbits and we bet that they’re the prettiest creatures that you’ve ever seen! But the tangled thing is that these lovely rabbits are exposed to the danger! Crazy and angry rabbits-mutants are hunting for every sweet bunny and try to kill him! As you see horrible legends about monster became true! And you’re the only one who can save bunny’s life! So just download this fighting game, save poor creatures and begin your own adventure! The rules of this hunter game are as easy as cake – there’re two types of rabbits – the first group is represented by white, lovely and funny creatures that are so pretty, that you can’t keep your eyes off them! But the second group of rabbits is like the most dreadful monster – all of them try to destroy white rabbits! So your aim in this jumping rabbit adventure game is to save all funny bunnies from monster, you should neatly kill every crazy rabbit and hence save the life of poor sweeties! You will be hunting for each monster who dared to attack white bunnies! Isn’t it tangled? You’ll not just aimlessly kill somebody, but you’ll save the loveliest creatures that’ve ever existed in this world! But playing this fighting game is quite complicated – each crazy jumping rabbit is very smart and elusive, so you should try a lot in order to save bunny’s life! Are you able to accept this challenge? If yes, just try this cute hunter game and test your strength and craftiness! Just imagine – pretty rabbits are suffering from crazy rabbit mutants, they are in despair and they’re waiting for you! Don’t leave each poor jumping rabbit to the mercy of fate, tackle the tangled issue with mutants and prevent their hunting! And remember that playing fighting game is the cutest chance to prove your bravery to your friends because not everyone is able to deal with crazy jumping rabbits-mutants! Download this game about dark legends and monster who is killing kind bunnies and you’ll become the hero of the virtual world! And besides the wonderful adventure, this funny game prepared a lot of bonuses for you! • First of all this adventure game is absolutely free! • In addition it’s offline game, so you’ll be able to play it and enjoy jumping rabbits without internet connection! • There are several levels available in this game! Will you accept the challenge and pass all of them? • Moreover this funny game has extremely vivid and colorful screen, what makes it possible for you to imagine yourself inside the legends about monster, hunting for white bunnies! Download the coolest hunter game and immerse yourself into the world of unforgettable adventures with your beloved bunnies!

description: The Official Arcus Motion ring 3D Augmented Reality application. Download the marker, print it and enjoy the 3D view of your favourite ring on your finger. Get the marker here: http://arcusmotion.com/marker.html What is AR and how does it work? Augmented Reality (AR) is a technology that lets you see digital content in real life environment. With AR you can see Arcus on your finger through you mobile phone's camera and check how cool will it look on your hand. To use AR, please follow these simple steps: 1. Download and print Arcus marker 2. Cut out the marker and wrap it on your finger 3. Start AR from the ARcus application with the "Show AR" button 4. description: "An excellent app" - Editor's Choice from DroidAppOfTheDay.com http://www.droidappoftheday.com/2012/11/klearkeys-transparent-keyboard.html KlearKeys is a highly customisable keyboard that allows you to create that unique look from seemingly endless possibilities. Turn your keyboard transparent and watch your favourite applications and websites come alive. From completely transparent to completely opaque, you decide exactly how transparent your keyboard is. Features: ● Customise background colour and transparency ● Optional auto correct with customisable colours and size ● Select from dozens of key images ● Option to float keyboard ● Split keyboard layouts ● Layout with arrow keys ● Customise key text colour / size and apply shadow effects ● Customise keyboard size with separate values for portrait and landscape modes. Take up the entire screen if you wish! ● Optional TrueShift which makes the shift key behave like ones found on hardware keyboards Phone versions available at - https://play.google.com/store/apps/developer?id=Touchscape+Software Fed up with large cumbersome keyboards that take up all the room on your screen? No problem. KlearKeys lets you decide exactly how large the key text is, how large the keyboard is and where the keyboard is placed. It can even fill the entire screen if you wish! Bored with grey keys on a grey background? No problem. KlearKeys lets you pick whatever colour you want for the keyboard background and key text. It also comes with dozens of different key images allowing you to get that look just right. Do you miss the way the shift key works on your hardware keyboard? No problem. KlearKeys uses TrueShift technology that takes advantage of multi-touch screens by shifting keys when pressed and un-shifting them when released. Ideal for tablets and large screen devices but works with any device running Android 3.1 and above. With numerous keyboard layouts (including split) configurable separately for portrait and landscape modes you have a highly customisable keyboard that allows you to create that unique look from seemingly endless possibilities. Similar To: A.I.type, GO Keyboard, Perfect Keyboard, SlideIT, Smart Keyboard, SwiftKey, Swype, Thumb Keyboard, TouchPal, Ultra Keyboard, Float-n-split
release_text: ● Added international characters popup on long press ● Added auto correct ● TrueShift is now optional ● Long-press ellipsis key displays settings ● Changes to settings are now immediately visible - watch the keyboard colour change as you change it!

好きな写真を好きなだけ組み合わせて、自由に合成・コラージュを楽しもう。 画像編集アプリだから、背景消去や色の調節なども自由自在。 ハートや星形等、切り抜きスタンプで楽々加工も可能。 ☆ 背景消去 　高性能消しゴム＆自動消去で、綺麗に背景消去。 ☆ 型抜き 　ハートや星形等、40種の形で、簡単切抜き。 ☆ レイヤー合成 　思い通りのレイアウトで配置して合成。 ☆ 文字入力 　好きなフォントが使え、色・影・縁取り・太さ等、自由に文字入れ。 ☆ スタンプ 　使いたいものをダウンロード＆不要なものは削除して容量も節約。 　さらに、自分で画像を登録することも出来るので、よく使う画像を登録しておけば非常に便利。 ☆ 操作性 極力、指と重なって扱いづらいことが無いように作られています。 ～ 重要 ～ ■強制終了について 多発する場合は、メモリ不足の可能性が高いです。このページの下部をお読みください。 ■スタンプやフレームについて 写真に合成して使用してください。 単体で取り出して、他で使用したり配布・販売することを禁止します。 また、加工したものでも素材としての配布・販売はおやめください。 ■保存について バナー表示のため、ネットワークが有効でない場合は、保存ができません。 また、合成して保存・元に戻す(SD)を指定の場合、画質の悪いjpgで保存されます。 保存制限解除を購入すると無効でも保存できます。 ～ 使い方 ～ 【 基本操作 】 ■[写真選択]で写真を開く。 ■[新規追加]でレイヤーを追加。 ■[特殊]→[下のレイヤーと結合]で1つに合成。 ■[個別保存]で、選択中のレイヤーをpng形式で保存。 ■[メニュー]→[合成して保存]で画面上の画像をjpg形式で保存。 【 画像操作 】 ■画像か、画面右の画像のアイコンをタッチで選択。 ■スライドやピンチ操作で移動・拡大縮小。 ■画面右の画像アイコンを上下にスライドで、画像の重なりの上下を入れ替え。 【 画像加工 】 ■[加工]で、自由変形・回転・文字入れなど。 ■[色調補正]で、透過や色の調整など。 ■[フィルタ]で、境界線やぼかし・シャープ・ブレ補正など。 ～ 権限の説明 ～ ・ストレージ 　　SDカードに保存するために利用します。 ・ネットワーク通信 　　バナー表示・スタンプダウンロード・一部機能の期限チェックに利用します。 　　バナーはスライドで移動でき、Backキーを「非表示」の場合は、ツールバーと一緒に非表示になります。 ・常に実行 これは、アプリが勝手に起動して終了できないというものではありません。 アプリの起動は他のアプリと同様に行え、終了も普通に行え、実行されなくなります。 Q.画質が悪くなるのですが、きれいに合成するにはどうすればいいですか? A.写真を選択後、切り取り画面が出るので、あらかじめ必要な部分を切り取ると、サイズを大きく取り込めます。 また、レイヤー結合や文字入れなど、大きさが確定する作業をする場合は、その後の拡大にむかないので、大きなサイズで作業するか、新規レイヤーを活用してください。 Q. 有料機能がどれかわかりません。 A.「メインメニュー」→「購入情報」から、各機能の購入への説明画面を表示できます。 この各機能の「説明画面」で、購入画面のボタンをタッチすると、最終確認の購入ボタンが表示され、ここでボタンをタッチすると購入となります。 通常にされていると、購入が必要な旨のメッセージが表示される、あるいはロゴが入る機能がございますが、上記以外の操作からは、購入(課金)されることは無いので、知らないうちに購入してしまうようなことはございませんので、安心してお使いください。 使いこなせるようになると、あると便利・より高度な合成が出来るようになる機能ですが、通常の切り抜き作業やコラージュ写真は、無料のままでも十分、高度な加工ができます。 Q.スタンプが使えない。 A.「PhotoEditerData」フォルダ内の「stamp」を一度削除して(全て消去されます)、ダウンロードしなおしてみてください。 Q.切り抜きスタンプが使えない。 A.「PhotoEditerData」フォルダ内の「cut」を削除して、「メニュ」→「設定」→「切り抜きスタンプを更新」をお試しください。
release_text: 更新が続いて、ご迷惑をおかけして申し訳ございません。 v0.402 結合先の画像サイズを維持したままレイヤー結合が可能。 編集ファイル選択時のバグ修正。 v0.393 自動消去・近似色消去に、画像用(アンチエイリアス無し)を追加 v0.392 編集ファイルのプレビュー表示。 読み込み画像の履歴の表示。 v0.391 透過色で塗りつぶしの不具合を修正。 v0.390 ぼかしフィルタ強化。 ブラシ強化。 近似色・自動消去に機能追加。 ヘルプボタンの非表示可。

description: This theme is for AOSP roms with xTheme Engine Its purpose is to enhance the Android UI without compromising the vanilla look. NOT suitable for Lollipop! If you have a ROM like Cyanogenmod 10/11 & co. download the version for theme chooser. For more info regarding xTheme chooser read here http://forum.xda-developers.com/showthread.php?t=2240180 HOW TO APPLY: -Install Xposed Installer from here http://forum.xda-developers.com/showthread.php?t=1574401 -Install Xposed Framework (from the Xposed Installer app) -Install HKThemeEngine from here http://forum.xda-developers.com/showthread.php?t=2602257 -Activate the module in Xposed Installer app -Activate the theme through HKThemeEngineApp -Enjoy! :) If the theme is not showing up in Xposed: -Backup the app to your sdcard using your favorite app (Romtoolbox): -Go into app manager -Find the theme app -Select it -Back it up to sdcard -Select the app again -Uninstall the app -Go to sdcard under app_manager -Into App_Backups -Select the Theme and install it -Go back into xposed and the theme will be there Official thread @ XDA Developers: http://forum.xda-developers.com/showthread.php?t=1615767 For problems send me a mail - razer.psn@gmail.com

description: The OneSmart App, brought to you by Air New Zealand, is the perfect companion to your OneSmart Account allowing you to manage your money on the go. To access the OneSmart App you will first need an activated OneSmart Account. With this app, you can: - Check your currency balances and move money between your currency wallets - Add, delete, and set the order of your wallets - View your OneSmart Account transaction history and set up Transaction Alerts - Check your Airpoints Dollars™ balance - Top up Airpoints Dollars for yourself or another Airpoints™ member - Request a free Virtual Card - Instantly send money to another OneSmart Account - Activate a new card to link to your OneSmart Account - Report your card lost or stolen - Login with your myairnz username and password Get smarter now: - Simply install this app and login using your myairnz username and password and answer your OneSmart security question. Find out more about the OneSmart App at airnz.co.nz/onesmart-app. Air New Zealand Airpoints Programme Terms and Conditions apply. Bank of New Zealand (BNZ) is the issuer of the OneSmart Account. Terms and Conditions and fees apply see airnz.co.nz/onesmart
