description: Be empowered for an all new travelling experience MyTransport.SG Mobile, an award winning app, is a content-rich service offering a wide range of information for all modes of land transportation – empowering commuters, motorists and cyclists in Singapore to make informed decisions and better plan their journey, with these features: • Personalise your favourite services with MyConcierge • Search and locate nearby bus stops and service number with bus route details • Get real-time island-wide bus arrival information • Search and locate nearby taxi stands and quick dial for taxi booking services • Report road defects via Snap & Send • Get real-time parking lots availability for popular locations • Plan route with Traffic News and ERP Gantries on Traffic Smart • View live traffic images along all expressways round the island • Receive notification on expressways traffic news during peak hours and train service delay information • Explore cycling towns, routes, and parking facilities • Find out lifestyle events and promotions nearby This app is proud to be a multiple local and international awards winners in: • 2014 Best Global m-Government Service Award, Dubai • 2013 Singapore infocomm Technology Federation (SiTF) Awards, Gold Winner in Most Popular Mobile Apps category and Silver Winner in Mobile Applications category • 2013 UiTP Grow with Public Transport International Awards, Integrated Mobility category • 2013 eGov Excellence Awards, Distinguished Winner in mServices category • 2013 Singapore Mobile Excellence Awards, Gold Winner in Best App/Content by Government/Community category • 2012 Summit Emerging Media Awards, Visionary Award in Navigation App category • 2012 W3 Awards, Silver Award in Maps and Navigation mobile app category For the full suite of land transport information and e-Services, please visit: http://www.mytransport.sg To help us improve this app, you are welcome to email us at: LTA-MyTransport@lta.gov.sg

description: As of January 22, 2016, Evernote will no longer support this app and this listing will be removed. See something that sparks an idea? Use Skitch to snap it, mark it up with simple tools, and send it on in an instant. Your bold ideas stand out even brighter with Skitch. ———————————— People everywhere use Skitch to help them visually share their thoughts with others. Here are a few ways you can use it, too: FOR FUN Mark up photos of silly, cool, or inspiring things you see and share them via social, email, SMS, and more. FOR HOME Annotate photos of your backyard to plan out your vegetable garden. FOR SCHOOL Share a diagram of the earth’s layers and have students label it with you. FOR EVENTS Capture a map, mark it up, and share it with your friends to show them where you'll be. FOR WORK Open a PDF and highlight changes to skip the lengthy, confusing email chains and give clear feedback. Or annotate a screenshot to communicate a change. ———————————— PDF Markup requires either an in app purchase or an Evernote Premium account. Skitch uses the contacts permissions in order to populate the email field when sending a PDF. This permission lets Skitch use your local address book so you can easily send an email by simply typing someone's name. More information about permissions at: http://s.evernote.com/skitchpermissions
release_text: Bug fixes and miscellaneous improvements. Also removed unnecessary permission requests.

description: Dive into this interactive book app for kids aimed at helping children develop a healthy view of money and abundance with the belief that a child's earliest thoughts and perceptions about these subjects are those that will last throughout his or her life. Explore pictures, learn new vocabulary, and follow along with three fun ways to read! After going through this omBook with your child, discuss the 10 follow up questions which reinforce the message and further develop children's understanding of money. Explore It's Not What You've Got!- Dr. Wayne W. Dyer: - ENCOURAGE literacy skills with highlighted narration - FOLLOW along with three fun ways to read! - NARRATED by Dr. Dyer - CUSTOM background audio Designed for children ages 4-8 ------------------------------------------------------------------------ The Reviews Are In: - "It’s Not What You’ve Got helps kids understand that having excessive wealth isn’t the most important thing in the world." - App Advice - "Even as an adult I learned from reading this book!" - I'm a full-time mummy! - "It encourages a healthy, interactive attitude towards money and possessions while maintaining childlike levels of understanding." - Kids book review ------------------------------------------------------------------------ We'd Love To Hear From You! - Please share your thoughts in a review! Your experience matters to us. - Need tech support? Contact us at  support@omapp.com - Say hello to us on FB! facebook.com/oceanhousemedia About the Authors Wayne W. Dyer, Ph.D., is an internationally renowned author and speaker in the field of self-development. He’s the author of 30 books, has created many audio programs and videos, and has appeared on thousands of television and radio shows. His books Manifest Your Destiny, Wisdom of the Ages, There’s a Spiritual Solution to Every Problem, and The New York Times bestsellers 10 Secrets for Success and Inner Peace, The Power of Intention, Inspiration, and Change Your Thoughts—Change Your Life have all been featured as National Public Television specials. Wayne holds a doctorate in educational counseling from Wayne State University and was an associate professor at St. John’s University in New York. Visit his Website: www.DrWayneDyer.com Kristina Tracy is having a great time working on children’s books with Wayne and Doreen. When she is not writing or being a mom, she loves gardening, horseback riding, and rearranging the furniture in her house. She may also be found at the counter at Starbucks pondering the infinite possibilities! Official Hay House licensed app: www.hayhouse.com

Runter vom Sessel, hinein in die Natur. Beim Durchstreifen von Wiesen und Wäldern, beim Genießen der Natur am Wasser, im Gebirge oder sogar in der Stadt gibt es viel zu entdecken und zu beobachten. In dieser App finden Sie Artporträts der typischen Tier- und Pflanzenarten, die auf dem Bauernhof zu finden sind. Diese kostenlose Starter App gibt Ihnen einen Einblick in das Projekt «Natur erleben» und begleitet Sie mit Wissenswertem über Tiere und Pflanzen auf dem Bauernhof. Sie können eigene Fotos und Notizen von Ihren Streifzügen in der Natur hinzufügen und mit dem Quiz prüfen, ob Sie die unterschiedlichen Arten erkennen. In der Vollversion der App lassen sich 450 Tierarten oder Tiergruppen und rund 300 Pflanzen aus insgesamt acht unterschiedlichen Lebensräumen bestimmen. Get off the chair, into nature. Wander through meadows and forests, while enjoying the nature on the water, in the mountains or even in the city there is much to explore and observe. In this app you will find Artporträts of typical animal and plant species that can be found on the farm. This free starter app gives you an insight into the project "experience nature" and accompanies you with interesting facts about animals and plants on the farm. You can define your own photos and add notes of your rambles in nature, and check with the quiz, if you recognize the different species. In the full version of the app can be 450 species or groups of animals and approximately 300 plants from eight different habitats determined.

Enter the World of Hexadrome! Control a stunning array of cosmic worlds by skillfully arranging the constantly evolving hexagon blocks dropping into your world from all directions. Connect similar colored hexagons to stay alive and escape to the next world. The game contains various special game pieces including Bombs, Wild Cards and Atomic Compactors to bring a new dimension of excitement to Tetromino style falling block games. Don’t wait too long to use your Bombs and Nuclear Compactors or Hexadrome might just chew you up and spit you back out. This free, extremely addictive and highly rated falling block arcade game includes 25 increasingly difficult levels for days of fun for all ages. Intuitive touch controls allow you to have fun quickly yet get the job done for advanced users. Do you have what it takes to dominate Hexadrome? Hexadrome features: + Absolutely Free, no game play limitations! + 25 exceedingly difficult worlds! + Bombs and Nuclear Compactors! + Wildcard game pieces! + Color Exterminator game pieces! + Stunning particle effects! + High Score features to challenge your friend and family! + Kids friendly game play provides days of fun for all ages! + Top rated! + Optimized to perform well on Android tablets. To sum it all up, Hexadrome can best be described as a Tetris-style game on steroids. Why don’t you give Hexadrome a try...you might just get addicted! PS: Note that I'm working on a Tetris style option for the game based on frequent user requests.
release_text: Recent changes include: - Performance Improvements and Bug Fixes. - Minor Bug fixes - Improved Swipe up/down functionality - Added new Color Terminator Game piece, Pause function etc. - Smoother support for tables PS: Note that I'm working on a Tetris style option for the game based on frequent user requests.

description: This App is actually a FREE handbook, which covers all the topics on Strength of Materials (SOM). You can consider this App as a notes which professors guides with in a classroom. You can very easily pass and succeed in your exams or interviews, if you have this App in your mobile phone, and give an overview just a few days. It covers 157 topics of Strength Of Materials in detail. These 157 topics are divided in 5 units. Some of topics Covered in this application are: 1. TENSILE STRESS 2. COMPRESSIVE STRESS 3. SHEAR STRESS 4. VOLUMETRIC STRESS 5. VOLUMETRIC STRAIN 6. SHEAR STRAIN 7. COMPRESSIVE STRAIN 8. TENSILE STRAIN 9. STRESS STRAIN DIAGRAM 10. THERMAL STRESS 11. POISSON RATIO 12. THREE MODULUS 13. Temperature Stress In Composite Bar 14. STRAIN ENERGY 15. MODULUS OF RESSILINCE AND TOUGHNESS 16. STRAIN ENERGY IN GRADUAL AND SUDDEN LOAD 17. STRAIN ENERGY IN IMPACT LOAD 18. HOOK'S LAW 19. STRESS, STRAIN AND CHANGE IN LENGTH 20. CHANGE IN LENGTH WHEN ONE BOTH ENDS ARE FREE 21. CHANGE IN LENGTH WHEN ONE BOTH ENDS ARE FIXED 22. Composite bar in tension or compression 23. Principal Stress And Principal Plane 24. Maximum Shear Stress 25. Theories Of Elastic Failure 26. Maximum Principal Stress Theory 27. Maximum Shear Stress Theory: 28. Maximum Principal Strain Theory 29. Total Strain Energy Per Unit Volume Theory 30. Maximum Shear Strain Energy Per Unit Volume Theory 31. Mohr’s Rupture Theory For Brittle Materials 32. Mohr’s Circle 33. Introduction to Bending Moment And Shearing Force 34. Shearing Force, And Bending Moment In A Straight Beam 35. Sign Conventions For Bending Moments And Shearing Forces 36. Bending Of Beams 37. Procedure For Drawing Shear Force And Bending Moment Diagram 38. SFD & BMD Of Cantilever Carrying Load At Its One End 39. SFD And BMD Of Simply Supported Beam Subjected To A Central Load 40. SFD And BMD Of A Cantilever Beam Subjected To U.D.L 41. Simply Supported Beam Subjected To U.D.L 42. Simply Supported Beam Carrying UDL & End Couples 43. Points Of Inflection 44. Theory Of Bending : Assumption And General Theory 45. Elastic Flexure Formula 46. Beams Of Composite Cross Section 47. Flexural Buckling Of A Pin-Ended Strut 48. Rankine-Gordon Formula 49. Comparison Of The Rankine-Gordon And Euler Formulae 50. Effective Lengths Of Struts 51. Struts And Columns With One End Fixed And The Other Free 52. Thin Cylinder 53. Members Subjected to Axisymmetric Load 54. ANALYSIS: Pressurized thin walled cylinder 55. Longitudinal Stress: Pressurized thin walled cylinder 56. Change in Dimensions: Pressurized thin walled cylinder 57. Volumetric Strain or Change in the Internal Volume 58. Cylindrical Vessel with Hemispherical Ends 59. Thin rotating ring or cylinder 60. Stresses in thick cylinders 61. Stresses in thick cylinders 62. Representation of radial and circumferential strain 63. A thick cylinder with both external and internal pressure 64. The stress distribution within the cylinder wall 65. Methods of increasing the elastic strength of a thick cylinder by pre-stressing 66. Composite cylinders 67. Combined stress distribution in a composite cylinder 68. Multilayered or Laminated cylinder 69. Autofrettage 70. Derivation of the hoop and radial stress equations for a thickwalled circular cylinder 71. Lame line 72. Plastic deformation of thick tubes 73. Lame line for elastic zone 74. Portion of the cylinder is plastic 75. Stress in thin cylinders 76. Horizontal diametrical plane 77. Strains in thin cylinders 78. Change in Volume of Cylinder 79. Compound Cylinders 80. Press Fits 81. Analysis of Press Fits 82. Castigliano's first theorem Wish you a very Happy Learning

description: Pirate Adventures is an action packed hidden object game that will excite everyone who loves mystery and pirate romance! TRY IT NOW FOR FREE, THEN UNLOCK THE FULL ADVENTURE FROM INSIDE THE GAME. Once upon a time, a pirate named Sharpshooter Jack obtained a mysterious, ancient box. Jack knew immediately that this box contained something very, very important, but what? It’s locked tight! Trying to find out what is hidden inside the box, Jack gets caught up in wonderful adventure! He will meet with the spirits and become a psychic, escape from prison and learn his destiny! Will he learn a secret of the box too? The answer depends on you! Key features: - An incredible story of pirates, treasure and an ancient curse - Thirty-two challenging levels - Colorful locations and interesting quests - Challenging mini games - Amazing graphics and music Wonderful adventures, picturesque characters and a little mystery are waiting for you! description: This is a mobile app for locating LPG stations around Europe. There are two features at the moment: - See all LPG stations in a country on a map (needs to be online to see the map) - A list of LPG stations closest to your current location (needs GPS coordinates). Please send an e-mail to info@myLPG.eu if you have any suggestions, problems or if you just want to say hi. Bare in mind, that this app is still in beta. Features: - over 27.000 LPG stations - 42 countries - nearest stations - an interactive map for each country - more to come... Station info window now shows also the coordinates. If you click on the info window one more time, the coordinates (latitude and longitude) will be saved to clipboard (you can paste it in your favorite navigational app). It is possible in a limitated way to save the map for offline usage, but please test it before you need it on the road.
release_text: Added functionality to update the database anytime you want.

description: Classic arcade action with fresh visuals! What's coming in the next release: -Better looking missiles. -Better looking planetary explosions. -New sounds -Ability to type your initials when there is a new high score. Ideas for future releases: -Ability to immediately start the game at more challenging levels. -Player abilities that unlock as you progress further (New weapons, shields, etc...) This is the ad supported version of Missile Defense. Find the ad free version, Missile Defense Pro, in the Android Market. Take the reigns as Supreme Commander of your military forces, tasked with holding off the complete and utter destruction of your planet. As the last line of defense, you must defend the planet from endless waves of missiles that steadily increase in numbers and speed. Tap the screen to trigger explosions in front of inbound missiles in order to destroy them before they destroy the 3 major population centers located on the surface of the planet. Press your device's option button for options and to pause the game. This game is based off of open source code and is still a work in progress. If you're interested in seeing the code to Missile Defense, would just like to suggest a feature, or just report a bug, send me an email at antiwiggin@gmail.com
release_text: -Small bug fix -Fixed a force close issue -Added a high score tracker. -You no longer need to wait for the final explosion to end in order to start a new game, you can now tap the screen to immediately move to the next screen. -Added a cleaner high resolution icon. -Pressing the back button now takes you to the title. Pressing the back button again properly terminates the application. -Small performance enhancements. -Fixed a memory leak/force close issue

description: ”Memory Trainer” is a puzzle game that is loved and known by many children and adults. It is the best game to play on our way, but what is more, it is a very efficient trainer for your brain! Every time you start a new game the pictures show you a random shuffled layout. The player’s task is not only to do the puzzle but to complete it with as little time wasted and moves made as possible. Peculiarities of our application:- It is up to you to play a classic puzzle game or select the complexity level and fulfill difficult tasks; - You have just 8 seconds to memorize the pictures; - Your best result enters the Table of Records; - You can enjoy 10 colorful topics and 10 complexity levels. ”Train Your Memory” is a wonderful game that will bring you anything bright and exciting but boredom! Let us train our memory on our way, at home, or while having rest – it is enjoyable and efficient!

Become the Stylist of your Dreams! Design and customize your own dress and makeup styles! In this dressup game, customize your creations with stickers, buttons, and outrageous accessories! Pick the colors, stitch, and personalize your very own dresses! Like dolls, these girls will model for your awesome costumes and amazing styles! Give the Fashion Girls a makeover and get them ready for the Red Carpet, the Run Way, Billboards, and Magazine Covers! Meet Grace, Chloe, Isabella, and Emily! Like them, when you are walking around the mall, you see so many styles, and you think, “I can be a better tailor!”. With this new app, you can choose to dress up these four awesome girls with clothes that you design! You can give them the dresses “off-rack”, but to really make them your own add your touch to the clothes! You can choose the color, the pattern, and add lines wherever you want! Time for the make up for the best makeover! When you are done with your very own outfits, you still need to choose the girl’s makeup before they head out with your dresses! You can mix and match the makeup to your own taste, from the lipstick and the mascara to the blush and the eyeliner; no one can tell you what to do! This is all about your creativity for dressup! And now, tailor... Make it work! It’s not just a dressup game; you have you designed your dress, customized it with stickers, buttons, your own stitching, and you have matched the perfect eyeliner to the eyelashes: it’s time to go out into the world! Your girls are ready to hit the runway! Walk down the red carpet, have their faces on the biggest billboards, or on the cover of every magazine in town! Features: > Design your very own clothes for dressup! Pick the color, make the stitches, add the stickers and buttons; make it work! > Give these super fashion girls the best makeover! > Choose their makeup: lipstick, mascara, eyeliner, and hairstyles! > You can choose their dresses but now you can even design your own dresses! > Choose the color, the pattern, add in buttons or stickers too! Take a picture! There’s no limits! > When the dress is perfect, put on their makeup, and show it to friends and family! > Once everything is ready, you decide where you want them to be: on the cover of magazines, on the runway, the red carpet, or even on the billboards! What’s inside Design It! - Outfit Maker for Fashion Girls Makeover > 4 awesome fashion girls that need you to style them! > 200 clothing items like shirts, dresses, and skirts to tailor for dressup! > 18 crazy and fabulous hairstyles! > 88 hand accessories and jewelry! > 76 kinds of mascara, lipstick, and eyeliner! > 4 awesome places to show off your superb design work! description: As melhores frases para você firmar ainda mais seu relacionamento. "As pessoas querem ser felizes, mesmo insistindo no equívoco de procurar conteúdos raros, nas embalagens erradas." "Atente-se, às vezes você pode ter o melhor presente em suas mãos, mas vai jogar fora como se fosse lixo." "Você acha que conhece as pessoas, mas você não sabe do que elas são capazes." "Às vezes sou grudento, às vezes mais maloca. Mas, eu sei que você não me troca." "Não tente me agradar fazendo o que gosto, sem você gostar." "Homem é igual cachorro: Você pode dar a melhor ração, mas ainda assim, ele vai teimar em fuçar o lixo." "Sentimentos mudam. Ainda bem." "Mulher tem que ser safada mesmo, mas com um homem só." "Não é que eu tenha me tornado uma pessoa fria. Apenas aprendi a me valorizar." "Nunca troque quem te faz sorrir, por quem vai te fazer chorar." "A vida é assim. A pessoa conhece outra, te esquece e fim!" "Amar de verdade, significa respeitar a pessoa, mesmo quando não tem ninguém olhando." "Da mesma boca que pode fazer uma alma sorrir, pode fazer um coração chorar." "Basta olhar no fundo dos meu olhos pra ver, que já não sou como era antes." "É um bem que faz tão mal." Baixe agora totalmente grátis! The best phrases to further embed their relationship. "People want to be happy, even insisting on the misconception of seeking rare content, in the wrong packaging." "Watch yourself, sometimes you can be the best gift in her hands, but it will play out like dirt." "You think you know people, but you do not know what they are capable of." "I am sometimes gooey, sometimes more longhouse. But I know you do not return." "Do not try to please me doing what I like, not like you." "Man is like a dog: You can have the best diet, but still, he will insist on digging into trash." "Feelings change. Glad." "Women have to be dirty even, but with one man." "Not that I have become a cold person. Just learned to value myself." "Never change who makes you smile, by whom will make you cry." "That's life. A person meets another, you forget and end!" "Love truth, means respecting the person, even when no one is looking." "From the same mouth that can make a soul smile can make a heart cry." "Just look deep into my eyes to see that I am no longer as it was before." "It is a good that is so bad." Download it now absolutely free!

Клуб OUM.RU предлагает всем практикующим обладателям устройств на базе ОС Андроид новое приложение "Календарь дней духовной практики". На текущий момент программа напоминает о днях экадаши и упосатхи. Считается, что именно в эти дни духовная практика является наиболее эффективной. Занятия в эти дни, при соблюдении правил экадаши и упасатхи, способствуют очищению на физическом, ментальном и духовном плане, и дает существенный прогресс в практике. В ближайшее время программа будет дополнена новым функционалом, который даст возможность практикам йоги планировать их занятия, выбирать подходящий режим дня и рацион питания. О пожеланиях к этому функционалу, вы можете написать в комментариях. OUM.RU club offers all practitioners owners of devices based on Android OS new application "Calendar days of spiritual practice." To date, the program reminds the days of Ekadashi and Uposatha. It is believed that in these days of spiritual practice is most effective. Things these days, subject to the rules and upasathi Ekadasi, help cleanse the physical, mental and spiritual level, and gives substantial progress in practice. In the near future the program will be complemented by new functionality that will enable practitioners to plan their yoga class, choose the appropriate mode of the day and diet. On regards to this functionality, you can write in the comments.

Immerse yourself in rich language and easily learn Chinese, in an entertaining way. All you have to do is download this app. You’ll enjoy reading this story while picking up another language with the proven effective technique of storytelling. Click “…More” to learn why you should download this App today! ❋❋❋ Winner, Best Digital Language Learning Contents (Industrial Development Bureau Ministry of Economic Affairs) ❋❋❋ ❋❋❋ Nominated for Creative App Competition (Business Next Magazine) ❋❋❋ ★★★★★ Looking for more apps for kids ”Audio quality is very good. Awesome.” - Wolfgang Boer ★★★★★ “Hi, my bilingual son loves your books - thanks. I like your books, too. “ - Patrick L O'Meley You and your child are learning a new language together, just by reading a Grimm’s fairy tale. Sometimes, you do the reading, sometimes you both take turns. You used to switch the voice reading on and let the program tell you the story but you don’t need it anymore because you’re learning fast. Thanks to this powerful app, you and your child are picking up another language while having quality time together, becoming bilingual, simply by having story time on a regular basis. Storytelling is one of the most effective techniques for learning a new language. It’s fun, too. When you read or tell stories to people, you immerse them in rich language in proper context, which in turn leads to higher levels of sophistication in speech and literacy. Yup, just by reading a story the right way. In this app, you get both English and Chinese subtitles and optional voice dubbing to help you with correct spelling, pronunciation and word recognition. The audio and visual presentation of the story is not only cute but also helpful for your listening and reading Chinese skills. Look at some of the features you get in this app: * Adorable graphics and easy to use interface * Multilingual language learning tool for native English speaking users * Formatted in a proven most effective way to learn and practice a second language * Each paragraph of story is presented in English with Chinese subtitles * Optional voice read along with text by native Chinese speaker * Automatic or manual page turn with gesture support * More than seven million users have downloaded the language learning picture books already! If you’ve been hoping for a fast, fun way to learn Chinese, you only have to download this app. Do it right now and you can begin to pick up another language as soon as today!

description: Enthält die original amtlichen Prüfungsfragen, Bilder und Videos von Oktober 2015 Das geniale Lernsystem für den Führerschein - Klasse B, als Ergänzung zur Fahrschule. Wie in einem intelligentem Karteikartensystem wiederholt die App alle offiziellen Prüfungsfragen. Ist eine Frage mehrfach richtig beantwortet kommt sie nur noch selten, so lernt man nur noch die Fragen die man noch nicht kann. Durch das Lern-O-Meter hat man jederzeit einen Überblick über den eigenen Wissensstand. Mit dieser App lernst Du auf einfache Weise und effizient alle Fragen für deinen Führerschein (Klasse B). Offizieller Fragenkatalog Stand: Oktober 2015 Die App beinhaltet: ✔ Statistik über gelernte Fragen und Lernstand ✔ Merken von Fragen und Lernen dieser als eigenes Kapitel ✔ Kurzanleitung in der App ✔ Übersicht über die letzen falsch beantworteten Fragen ✔ App arbeitet Offline, Internetverbindung ist nicht notwendig ✔ Die Fragen die durch das letzte Online Update geändert wurden, werden in einer Liste angezeigt ✔ Lernstandsynchronisierung - Es ist nun möglich deinen Lernerfolg online mit Büffeln.Net abzugleichen. Dadurch hast du die Möglichkeit mit mehreren Geräten und im Web gleichzeitig an einer Prüfung zu lernen und deinen Lernstand überall hin mitzunehmen ✔ optionaler Benachrichtigungsdienst für Neuigkeiten rund um diese App und Bueffeln.Net ✔ Prüfungsmodus (es ist möglich eine Prüfung unter gleichen Bedingungen wie in der amtlichen Prüfung zu simulieren, In-App Kauf) Contains the original official exam questions, photos of October 2015 The ingenious learning system for the driver's license - Class B, as a complement to the driving school. Like a smart flashcards system repeats the app all official exam questions. If a question is answered correctly more than once it comes only rarely, so you learn only the questions which you have not known. By learning-O-Meter you always have an overview of their own knowledge. With this app you will learn easily and efficiently all the questions for your driver's license (Class B). Official questionnaire as of October 2015 The app includes: ✔ In learned questions and learning status ✔ memorizing questions and learning these as a separate chapter ✔ Quick Start Guide in the App ✔ Overview of the last incorrectly answered questions ✔ App works offline, Internet connection is not necessary ✔ The questions that have been changed by the last online update, are displayed in a list ✔ learning level synchronization - It is now possible to your learning success online match with Büffeln.Net. Thereby you have the possibility with several devices and on the web to learn at the same time in an examination and take all your learning progress towards ✔ optional notification service for news about this app and Bueffeln.Net ✔ test mode (it is possible to simulate a test under the same conditions as in the official inspection, in-app purchase)
release_text: ★ Aktueller Fragenkatalog von Oktober 2015 mit allen neuen Videofragen ★ • Verbesserungen der Zuverlässigkeit und Geschwindigkeit

description: Aplicación oficial de la Universidad Nacional de Educación a Distancia (UNED) para la reproducción de recursos AVIP (Audio Visual sobre tecnología IP) de INTECCA (Innovación y Desarrollo Tecnológico de los Centros Asociados). Estos recursos audiovisuales son web conferencias que han sido grabadas y posteriormente publicadas en el portal AVIP. Estas web conferencias comprenden eventos, videoclases, tutorías, etc., que se celebran diariamente en la UNED. Desde esta aplicación se pueden reproducir las grabaciones, interaccionar con el video y las anotaciones hechas por los ponentes, revisar el chat, o descargarse los documentos utilizados en la sesión. Formal implementation of the National University of Distance Education (UNED) resources for playing AVIP (Audio Visual on IP technology) of INTECCA (Innovation and Technology Development Centers Associates). These web resources are audiovisual lectures have been recorded and later published in the AVIP website. These events include web conferencing, video lessons, tutorials, etc.., Held daily in the UNED. From this application you can play recordings, video and interact with the notes made by the speakers, check the chat or download the documents used in the session.

The best user friendly app on Google Play! Aircraft Fuel Calculator is a free and specific application designed to cater for Aircraft Maintenance Engineers/ Technicians/ Mechanics (AME) who require immediate access to fuel calculation while performing Pre-departure/ Transit checks while aircraft refuelling without the use of a calculator. Aircraft fueling has been made easier ! Features: ★ Enter aircraft fuel in litres or gallons(US) and get the value in kilograms(kg) or pounds(lbs) using the current Specific Gravity(SG) or weight per gallon. ★ Enter Proposed Departure fuel given by pilot or dispatch.(optional) ★ Get the Departure fuel/Actual Uplift calculated in kilograms(kg) or pounds(lbs). ★ Calculates the difference of fuel quantity in aircraft and Departure Fuel/Actual Uplift. ★ Calculates discrepancy between calculated uplift and uplift by bowser. ★ Very light on system requirements. ★ Works for all Aircrafts. ★ UTC Time also given. Benefits: ★ No calculator required as it automatically calculates the value of Uplift and Departure fuel. Note: Read Instructions before use. DISCLAIMER: The usage of this app is at your own risk. The owner of the app will not be held liable under any circumstances. PLEASE RATE and give your valuable feedback. If you have any suggestion, questions or problems, PLEASE email at anantutilitylabs@gmail.com

description: The first File Manager for you Android Wear Watch, you can use it to find files on your watch, send or receive files from your phone to your Watch, and view photo or text file on the watch. This App also have the full feature Phone File Manager included. Features (some features only available on the phone): - list all files and folders - touch the file/folder icon to open file/folder - order by name/date/file size - send via email/bluetooth/note (Phone Only) - rename file - batch delete file - open file based on type - built-in Photo Viewer - action button: Refresh,Send to Phone Or Watch, SDCard,select all, share, rename, delete, order by name, order by date, order by file size - Photo Slides view, touch left top corner to play slides, touch right top corner go to previous photo, touch right bottom corner go to next photo - Change Photo Slides timer in option menu (Phone Only) - Built-in text file viewer FAQ: * Where can I find the files sent ? The receiving folder is the folder you open when you send files to Watch or Phone. You can use the SDCard icon to go to SDCard folder to receiving files. * What's the ICON means ? The icon from left to right means: Refresh, Send file, go to SD Card folder, Select All, Share files, Rename file, Delete File, Order by Name, Order by length, New Folder, copy file, cut , paste, cancel. We have just released the 'Watch Tools for Android Wear' with App Launcher and remote control phone features, you can find it here: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.woiapp.WearWatchTools (Special Notes for Install: Android Wear Watch App install takes extra time, so please wait about 20s ~ 1minute after phone install App complete.)

description: The original NOAA buoy app that has been a top 20 on iPhone for years is finally on Android. Do not accept imitators. This is the buoy app your friends with iPhones have told you about. NOAA Buoy and Tide Data allows you to retrieve weather data from NOAA's National Data Buoy Center. It also provides tide predictions for the US. The perfect tool to help plan your time on he water. **For a map of buoys locations, go here: http://www.ndbc.noaa.gov/ * Search for buoys by name or region. * View buoys near you with customizable search radius. * Use GPS or manually entered location. * Map of buoy locations. * Detailed live buoy data with access to location specific forecasts. * Save your favorites for easy access. * Quick access to buoy's website from within the application. * Buoys sorted by proximity to your selected location. * Tide Predictions. * Moon phases. Data can include wind speed, gusts, and direction as well as pressure and other relevant marine data. If you participate in activities where marine weather is important, you need this app. Great for: boating sailing diving fishing kite boarding and any activity where marine weather conditions are important. If you fish at sea like we do, this is a great app for you. Another quality App brought to you by boaters and fisherman. We use our products everyday and listen to our customers. If you have any issues, please contact us. We will reply.
release_text: * Corrected issue with not being able to save nearby buoys to favorites. * Corrected issue with page link not displaying correctly

description: ESTA APLICACIÓN SE ENCUENTRA DISCONTINUADA Y NO RECIBIRÁ NUEVAS ACTUALIZACIONES NI CORRECCIÓN DE ERRORES. TE RECOMENDAMOS UTILIZAR NUESTRA NUEVA APLICACIÓN QUE PUEDES INSTALAR DESDE http://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.chathispano.chathispano Chat Hispano es la aplicación de chat para Android que te permitirá conectarte a la red de chat Hispano desde tu teléfono o Tablet Android. Esta aplicación basada en el popular cliente Yaaic http://www.yaaic.org (Yet Another Android IRC Client) bajo licencia GPL, permite conectarse a Chat Hispano desde tu terminal Android disponiendo de las mismas características y funcionalidades que en un cliente de escritorio. Podrás chatear con tus amigos desde tu teléfono o Tablet estés donde estés utilizando tanto la conexión 3G de tu teléfono como la conexión wifi y todo ello sacando partido a las características multitactiles de los terminales Android. Puedes obtener más información en: http://www.chathispano.com Características detalladas Gratuita: Chat Hispano es una aplicación totalmente gratis, en ningún momento pagaras nada por chatear en Chat Hispano, todos sus servicios son gratuitos. Acceso rápido al chat de ChatHispano: Al ser una aplicación específica de Chat Hispano no es necesario configurar nada, conecta de forma automática a nuestro chat. Mono-red: Tan solo permite el acceso al chat de Chat Hispano Soporte del sistema de nicks registrados de Chat Hispano: El chat de ChatHispano dispone de un avanzado sistema de reserva de nicks o alias, esta aplicación permite identificarse y utilizar un Nick registrado en nuestra red de chat Soporte multicanal: La aplicación permite acceder de forma simultánea a tantas salas como precises de forma que puedas estar al tanto de todos tus intereses y chatear con todos tus amigos. Desplazamiento por el texto de los canales y mensajes privados arrastrando: Cuando necesites volver atrás en una conversación solo tendrás que arrastrar con el dedo hacia arriba. Navegación entre ventanas arrastrando: Para navegar entre las ventanas de las salas y los chats privados se arrastra con el de dedo hacia los lados convirtiendo el chat móvil en algo fácil e intuitivo. Soporte de la mayoría de los comandos de IRC: Desde está aplicación podrás sacar el máximo partido a tu sesión de IRC pues podrás ejecutar los mismos comandos que desde un cliente de escritorio. Compatibilidad con los colores del mirc: Vive el chat en colores, el MiRC se ha convertido en un estándar y con esté cliente podrás ver los colores tal como los escriben tus amigos y amigas. Soporte de “Nick Completion”: No necesitas escribir todo un Nick o alias, tan solo con empezar a escribir el programa completará el resto. Soporte de emoticonos (smileys): Verás las famosas caras tal como están pensadas, con una sonrisa. Acceso rápido a los canales más populares del Chat de ChatHispano: Para hacer más rápido el acceso al chat te ponemos los canales y salas más populares a un click, chatea gratis en la sala de tu ciudad con #madrid, #barcelona o #zaragoza o encuentra amigos de tu edad con #de_18_a_25 o haz amigos en América con #peru #venezuela o #mexico. Soporte integro de multitarea de Android: Aunque minimices la aplicación de chat para hacer otras cosas está seguirá conectada para que no te pierdas ninguna conversación importante. Soporte de notificaciones Android: Cuando tengas el programa minimizado si te nombran o te hablan recibirás una notificación, no te pierdas ningún mensaje de uno de tus amigos o amigas. Soporte de comandos de administración de canales sobre usuarios (kick, ban, etc.): Si eres moderador de un canal, podrás moderarlo desde tu móvil o Tablet. http://www.facebook.com/IRCHispanoChat http://twitter.com/#!/IRCHispanoChat http://www.tuenti.com/chatirchispano THIS APPLICATION IS DISCONTINUED AND NOT RECEIVE NEW UPDATES OR CORRECTION OF ERRORS. WE RECOMMEND USING OUR NEW APPLICATION FROM YOU CAN INSTALL http://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.chathispano.chathispano Chat Hispano is the chat application for Android that lets you connect to the network of Hispanic chat from your Android phone or tablet. It is based on the popular client Yaaic http://www.yaaic.org (Yet Another Android IRC Client) under GPL license application can connect to Chat Hispano from your Android terminal providing the same features and functionality in a desktop client . You can chat with friends on your phone or tablet wherever you are using both the 3G connection on your phone as wifi and all this taking advantage of the multi-touch features of Android terminals. You can get more information at: http://www.chathispano.com Detailed Features Free: Chat Hispano is a totally free application, in no time you will pay nothing for chat Chat Hispano, all services are free. Quick access to chat ChatHispano: As a specific application of Chat Hispano do not need to configure anything, connects automatically to our chat. Mono-red: Only allows access to chat Chat Hispano System Support Chat Hispano registered nicks: The chat ChatHispano has an advanced booking system nickname or alias, this application allows to identify and use a Nick registered on our chat network Multichannel support: The application allows simultaneous access to as many rooms as precises so you can keep track of all your interests and chat with all your friends. Scrolling text channels and private messages dragging: When you need to go back in a conversation just have to drag your finger up. Navigation between windows by dragging: To navigate between windows of the rooms and private chats dragging the finger sideways becoming mobile chat easy and intuitive. Support most IRC commands: From this application you can make the most of your IRC session because you can execute the same commands from a desktop client. Support mirc colors: Live chat colors, mIRC has become a standard and is customer will see colors as they are written your friends and girlfriends. Support "Nick Completion": No need to write a whole or alias Nick, just start typing the program will complete the rest. Support emoticons (smileys): You see famous faces as they are designed, with a smile. Quick access to popular chat channels ChatHispano: To make quicker access to chat you put the most popular channels and a click rooms, free chat room in your city with #madrid, #barcelona or #zaragoza or find friends your age with # de_18_a_25 or make friends in America with #peru #venezuela or #Mexico. Support integro Android Multitasking: Even if you belittle the chat application to do other things is still connected so you do not miss any important conversation. Support Android notifications: When you have the program minimized if you named or speak you get a notification, do not miss any message from one of your friends or girlfriends. Support command channel management on users (kick, ban, etc.): If you are a moderator of a channel, you can moderate it on your phone or tablet. http://www.facebook.com/IRCHispanoChat http://twitter.com/#!/IRCHispanoChat http://www.tuenti.com/chatirchispano

description: Young Dracula comes to like cracker(sweets) rather than man’s blood. Cut the cracker(sweets) for the young Dracula. Everyone will help him, won’t you? He does not harm you. All friends in the world should help him. Challenge the high score through various modes. Enjoy lightly.

This Set is made of 8 skins !! - 1st is a nice weather widget, others are Big Icons (set them up the way you like), - Messages / Calls notifications count ! UCCW's developer do all is best for you to enjoy the Gmail notifications count soon. This Gmail icon (and others) will be integrated in next updates ----------------------------------------------- Required ----------------------------------------------- UCCW (Ultimate Custom Clock Widget) free. Before Downloading this skin, make sure UCCW 2.1.2 or higher is already installed on your device : http://goo.gl/TZgw0 I recommand you use a Launcher app like Nova (Light and fast launcher) to give you more flexibility with widgets sizing on the homescreen (and other stuff like overlay, etc). ----------------------------------------------- [HOW TO] Install : ----------------------------------------------- 1 - Once you've downloaded/installed the skin, 2 - Add a UCCW widget to your homescreen (via long press on homescreen if you're running a launcher or via appdrawer if you're on stock ROM), 3 - When UCCW skins' list pops up, choose the downloaded skin to apply, 4 - Touch the pic 5 - Enjoy :) repeat steps 2, 3, 4 and 5 if you add another skin. ----------------------------------------------- [HOW TO] Use hotspots (new) : ----------------------------------------------- UCCW Skins can provide hotspots (or not) : This one got a lot of hotspots. For the hotspots to work, in UCCW menu, turn Hotspot Mode ON. ----------------------------------------------- Tips ----------------------------------------------- - In the UCCW menu, if skin downloaded got a location and/or weather element, set the location to auto (if it's enable, then disable and enable it again for the location to work properly). - In UCCW skin's list, long press a skin to delete it, In some rare case your skin may not sho up in the UCCW skin list since there's a new encryption feature introduced in Jelly Bean. Google Play uses feature while installing skins. All third party themes and similar PAID apps like Beautiful widgets, Go launcher etc, are affected by this new encryption. If your are experiencing similar issue, please do not give this skin a bad rate, contact-me first ;) ----------------------------------------------- FYI : Visit my xda thread and download it for free (*.uzip) http://forum.xda-developers.com/showthread.php?t=1700008 -----------------------------------------------

description: Panda Live Wallpaper features a cute panda within magical atmosphere featuring various themes! Choose from various themes where each one has an unique atmosphere!

After getting lost in maze manor for many months, Ted finally found his way out. Unfortunately on his journey home, Ted was kidnapped by a pack of glow monsters, who shoved him down into their dungeons! Help Ted escape the underground world of the glow monsters in this super fun adventure game. Starting in the deepest part of the dungeon, Ted will make his way through progressively difficult levels of the underground world until finally reaching daylight. As with other classic platform games, Ted will need your help jumping over pits of lava, dodging falling spikes, and avoiding all of the evil glow monsters who are eager to put Ted back in his cell. Features: - Platformer Adventure Game! - Lava, Fireballs, and Spikes! - Flying and Jumping Glow Monsters! - Over 20 levels! Tips and How to play: Left and right arrows: Moves Ted left and right Right red button: Makes Ted jump Left red button: Enter doors and interact with objects For each level, find the exit door and hit the left red button to enter. Avoid the glow monsters! If they touch you, they will send you back to the beginning of the dungeon level! Don't fall into lava, spikes, or run into fireballs! Timing is key!

Tap til you drop with Happy Tiles! The faster you tap the quicker you move and you'd better be fast because you only got 20 seconds to tap as many Happy Tiles as you can. Watch out though, you tap a grumpy tile and it's game over. This easy to learn though to mast game will keep you coming back for more just to beat your own score. Integrated GameCicle leader boards so you can share you scores with your friends and the world! What are you waiting for? Those Happy Tiles aren't going to tap themselves.

Play a captivating game of bubble blasting. Form strings of 3 or more same-color bubbles to blast them away. The bubbles move in a spiral so you need to blast them before they reach the center. Place your bubbles to form strings and train yourself well to improve your aiming. ★ ★ ★ FEATURES ★ ★ ★ ✓ 32 challenging levels ✓ intuitive interface ✓ daily/monthly/all time highscores ✓ chain blasting ★ ★ ★ TIPS ★ ★ ★ ✓ Tap the screen and drag around the center to aim the bubble. ✓ Release the drag when ready. ✓ The bubble shot will be included in the string at the closest position found. ✓ You can blast string of bubbles if you form groups of 3 or more same-color bubbles. ✓ The game ends if the bubbles reach the end of the spiral path. ✓ The first number in the info-bar represents the current score. ✓ The second number in the info-bar represents the score you have to gain in order to pass to a new level. ✓ You gain 10 points for each bubble blasted. ✓ Blasting strings of bubbles longer than 3 wins you additional points. ✓ The bubbles accelerate as you pass to superior levels. ✓ You can restart the game by pressing -New Game- in the main menu. ✓ You can pause the game by entering the main menu. ✓ You can turn the sound and music on or off from the main menu. ★ Support and Feedback If you have any technical problems please email us directly at support@gsoftteam.com . Please, don’t leave support problems in our comments – we don’t check those regularly and it will take longer to fix any issues that you might encounter. Thank you for your understanding! Already a fan of Bubble Blaster? Like us on Facebook or follow us on Twitter for the latest news: https://www.facebook.com/gsoftteam https://twitter.com/gsoftteam

description: [Snakes 'n' Ladders Classic] aka [Chutes and Ladders] is the traditional famous board game, with two game types: 1- You Vs CPU (traditional game): Race between the 2 players (you and CPU) to arrive to the end of board OR, 2- Time Challenge: You have to achieve your goal with shortest possible time, best time achieved will be saved as high score to be defeated again and again. Touch the [Touch 'n' Release] area top right the board to throw the die. Make your way to the end of the board, you may like landing on ladder, so you'll find easy shortcut, but be care, you'd better watch out for those slippery snakes HOW TO PLAY: The goal of the game: The aim of the game is to be the first to reach the end by moving across the board from square 1 to square 100. You will travel the board from base to top, right, then left and so on. Commence playing: The dice must be rolled by touching the dice at the upper right corner of the screen to show the number of squares that the player may move to. Place the marker on the appropriate square.Each player may only roll once. Snake: if a player lands at the tip of the snake's head, his or her marker slides down to the square at the snake's tail. Ladder: if a player lands on a square that is at the base of a ladder, his or her marker moves to the square at the top of the ladder and continues from there. Enjoy.
release_text: 1.3.1 - New Classic Boars Added - Minor fixes 1.2.1 - Music and game sounds can be controlled separately - Throwing dice with 2 methods a: Free fall (the old classic method of the game) b: Rolling (more realistic motion with initial throw speed) - Shake to throw die is now controlled by toggle button - Score table is added in the second [settings screen] - Fix Restart, Resume Exit on small screen 1.0.0 Original release

description: This app is a terminal for Android phones. You can access your Android's built-in Linux command line shell, and use many available commands (Linux/Unix) in your device. It allows you to browse your phone, create or delete files and directories. It's possible to use root options.

A game made by its players. The Snake on Mars is a very addictive game in which the player use various tools to find the home. The game world is set at Mars where there is gravity and the gravity can be switched up-down-side. On Mars there are lots of teleport door through which the snake can be teleported from one place to another place immediately. The snake is very strong and he can move against gravity by its body support. So his body length is very import for he can use his body to climb higher places. Also there are various pelletes, after the snake eat the pellete, his body will be changed, maybe be longer. Aha, sounds familiar? No, this game is very different from the classic greedy snake game , just try it and have fun. All above is about the "official game" part. The game has interactive parts which makes this game even more intetresting. The player can build the world of Mars by him(er)self, and upload the world to the server. Then other players can download and play the "player made game". If you have made a world and uploaded it, then you use it to challenge your friends, and strangers. So do not be panic if you are challenged by a stranger. The players can also chat with each other.

Ages 2 – 8 Features: • Read to me / Read to myself options • Two reading levels of text to choose from • Interactivity with sound effects on every page • Colorful, unique illustrations blending real dog photos and graphics • Navigate back and forth through the pages using the menu bar • Search for Torii’s bone throughout the book • Includes additional activity/coloring pages at the end of the story Torii’s Summer Adventure is a full length children’s picture book with over 80 touch points of interactive animation and sound effects. Written by an elementary teacher, this colorful and amusing book follows the adventures of a loveable and curious Golden Retriever who loves exploring around the lake. Children will love Torii and learning about the animal friends she meets along the way! See more about Torii and her adventures, download educational activities, and preview other books in the Torii’s Adventures Series at toriisadventures.com. Please rate and review the app. Your feedback means a lot to us!

Meet Bubble Jet Raider, a brave cave explorer who travels in his bubble. You have to break the crystals and avoid unpredictable obstacles with your right hand and with the left – still control the bubble. Your goal is to get as far as possible. One of the biggest surprises of this season in Google Play!. The cave is full of unexpected obstacles, which don’t allow the character to move deeper and discover new chambers of the cave. The biggest threat are the crystals, which are numerous and dangerous. You have to stay alert at all times! If you want to get far and gain a high score,. Remember, don’t let the bubble pop! Features: - Three control options: BALANCE, SWIPE or TAP - Control with right- and left-hand - Taking pictures while playing – share it on Facebook - Interesting and easy to use menu - Original 2D graphics and cool music - Realistic physics - Unusual bonus items - Game Center Achievements to complete - Rakings for you and other players - Unforgettable and endless game play! Keep calm and be a Bubble Jet Raider! Make a profit
release_text: Brand new - a completely new edition of the Bubble Jet Raider! Collect coins and buy power-ups. This allows you to successfully deal with obstacles and get deep into the cave. Want to have an extra club, a new life, and maybe a pneumatic hammer? Power-ups can be picked up during play and may have an essential impact on your success! You can also purchase additional coins and buy a lot of power-ups.

description: Israel History Maps: Geographical Chronology of Jewish Sovereignty and Presence in the Middle East More information about the project can be found at http://www.IsraelHistoryMaps.com The project is available for purchase via: Printed book (softcover) can be found here: https://www.createspace.com/5527043 Printed book (hardcover) can be found here: http://www.lulu.com/shop/ilan-reiner-and-amir-reiner/israel-history-maps/hardcover/product-22227947.html The " Israel History Maps " was created to illustrate the Jewish presence and heritage in the Middle East region throughout the last 3400+ years, and to refute the claim that Jews have only recently arrived and brutally taken their land from other sovereigns in recent centuries. The project contains over 50 informative legible maps of today's Israel's region illustrating sovereignty in easy to understand, friendly graphics, along with a periodical timeline. The map set is divided into three eras, marking the three main periods of Jewish sovereignty in the region. The project is based on extensive research by previous winner of "The Tanach Quiz", Ilan Reiner, who has in depth knowledge of Jewish geography and history. Printed book (softcover) can be found here: https://www.createspace.com/5527043 website: http://israelhistorymaps.com/ facebook: https://www.facebook.com/IsraelHistoryMaps Team: Created and Produced by Amir Reiner Research and Graphics by Ilan Reiner Software Design by ConKor Systems Ltd ( http://www.conkor.co.il ) If you liked it, I think you would also find the following app interesting: IJewish Timeline - 6000 Years Ronen Rabinovici https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.odyeda.JewishTimeline_Hebrew

"DONUT TYCOON THE BOARD GAME" is a fusion of the time management game and the board game(like the Monopoly). You can enjoy the thrill of the management game and the addictiveness of the board game simultaneously. You’ll walk on the way for the master of donut business. Work proceeds by your dice. Roll the dice and make corresponding moves. In the land you arrive, a special event will happen. You should make your store in as many lands as possible.(Board game) At a store, you can play the donut business game. Make and sell the donuts people want to earn money.(Time management game.) If you arrive at a rival store, you can take the enemy’s store. And at a store of yours, you can increase the sales of the store. Anyway do your best to earn more than the goal money. There is a ‘chance card’ which makes your business more efficient. It is similar to the magic card of the trading card game. The ‘Chance card’ will help you greatly. It is a very important fact which makes this game exciting. FEATURES Three game styles in one. -Board game with dice.(like the Monopoly) -Card game.(like the Magic the Gathering) -Donut game.(Creative management game) The rule of this game isn’t difficult. Just choose what you want as the flow. You can try the donut business game in the Arcade mode separately. Never miss this game, if you want a creative and substantial entertainment. Easy and addictive the ‘Donut Tycoon the board game' will keep your adrenaline going.

description: Tic Tac Toe is an easy but nonetheless exciting game for people of all ages. Each player chooses his/her sign – an “X” or an “0”, and taking turns they put their signs one by one into the squares of the 3x3 field. The winner is the one who is the first to put his/her signs without breaks horizontally, vertically or diagonally. Game Features: Single Player (vs Computer), Multi-player (using Google Play Game Services), and Achievements.

Health and Poison counter for Magic the Gathering. Keeps track of up to 8 different players, has a timer for knowing how long the game has been going which you can pause by tapping on it. Alternate backgrounds for each player that can be changed by pressing the number at the top of their tile. Also some fun animations and sounds from Unreal Tournament like "First Blood" and "Double Kill" when players deal damage that can be toggled off and on. Up to 15 different sounds will play based on how much damage you deal.

description: Esta é a nova versão do aplicativo Santander Minha Conta para Tablet! Depois de instalar, você irá desfrutar de todas as novas funcionalidades que preparamos para simplificar seu dia a dia no relacionamento com o Santander: - [NOVO] Acesso simplificado usando apenas seu CPF e senha - [NOVO] Visão consolidada de Contas Correntes, Cartões, Investimentos e Empréstimos para facilitar a gestão financeira - [NOVO] Consulta de Saldo e Extrato dos últimos 60 dias e de Lançamentos futuros dos próximos 7 dias - Pagamento de Contas e Boletos com Leitor de código de barras - Transferências para Crédito em Conta, DOC e TED - Faturas de Cartões de Crédito dos últimos 12 meses e Cadastro para envio por e-mail - Pagamentos de Fatura de Cartões com possibilidade de Parcelamento - [NOVO] Faturas de Cartões de Crédito com visão gráfica - Recarga de celular, com a opção de Recarga programada - Aplicação e resgate de Poupança e CDB - Posição consolidada de Fundos de Investimentos - Contratação e cancelamento de Crédito Pessoal - [NOVO] Comprovantes por e-mail - Localização de Agências Antes de baixar, é muito importante você saber que: Este aplicativo é exclusivo para clientes do Banco Santander e está disponível apenas em Português. O Santander nunca solicita dados pessoais ou cadastrais do cliente, dados protegidos por sigilo bancário ou outras informações confidenciais por e-mail, nem a digitação de mais de uma posição do cartão de senha. O download dos aplicativos só deve ser feito através das lojas oficiais do sistema operacional do cliente, nunca por links ou endereços externos. Não recomendamos o uso do aplicativo em dispositivos que passaram por processos de remoção de restrições operacionais (root e/ou jailbreak). Para efetuar transações financeiras é necessário habilitar o aparelho no Santander Internet Banking: 1) Após o download, efetue login no aplicativo; 2) Acesse o Santander Internet Banking e na aba Celular/Mobilidade selecione a opção Desbloqueio de Aparelho. Sem o desbloqueio do aparelho, somente estarão disponíveis as transações de consulta. Qualquer dúvida entre em contato com a Central de Atendimento Santander. This is the new version of Santander My Account application for Tablet! After installing, you will enjoy all the new features we prepare to simplify their daily lives in relationship with Santander: - [NEW] Simplified access using only your Social Security number and password - [NEW] consolidated view of current accounts, cards, investments and loans to facilitate the financial management - [NEW] Balance query and extract the last 60 days and Releases future the next 7 days - Bill Payment and billets with barcode reader - Transfers for Credit Account, DOC and TED - Credit Card Bills the last 12 months and Registration for e-mail - Card Invoice Payments with the possibility of Installment - [NEW] Invoice Credit Cards graphical view - Mobile Recharge, the recharge option with scheduled - Application and rescue Savings and CBD - Consolidated position of Investment Funds - Hiring and cancellation Personal Loan - [NEW] vouchers by email - Agencies Location Before downloading, it is very important you know that: This application is exclusively for customers of Banco Santander and is available only in Portuguese. Santander never ask for personal or registration data of the client, data protected by bank secrecy or other sensitive information by email or typing in more than one position of the password card. The download applications should only be done through the official stores client operating system, never for external links or addresses. We do not recommend using the application on devices that have undergone removal of operational constraints processes (root and / or jailbreak). To conduct financial transactions is necessary to enable the unit in Santander Internet Banking: 1) After downloading, log in to application; 2) Go to Santander Internet Banking and Mobile tab / Mobility select the Unlock Device option. Without the device's release, only the query transactions are available. Any questions please contact the Customer Service Center Santander.

description: STOP and INSTALL Google Text-to-speech (https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.google.android.tts) or any quality TTS before complaining about your default TTS. Learn how to write 200 words for 3rd graders. In handwriting mode (experimental), you can write answers instead of pressing buttons. Click on words to hear sounds. You can review incorrect spellings. Review algorithm is based on latest memory retention technologies. This is an ad-supported version. Network connection required. Please also try our paid version at https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.rioneutron.spelling3 This is one of the Spelling K-12 series from Spelling Kindergarten to Spelling 12th Grade. All your test results are captured and analyzed for your best memory retention. There are total 6 color codes and words change colors based on your marks. By default, words are in black. If you keep getting a word incorrect, it will turn yellow, orange and finally red. If you get a word right, it will turn greener. 10 Words are grouped into a chapter. If you get all 10 words right, the chapter icon will get a check mark. In review chapter, all incorrectly spelled words will appear in priority order based on the latest memory retention technologies. If you don't have enough time, just go to the review chapter and the app will make sure that you spend the least amount of time and maximize memory retention on words. This app will help you learn words very efficiently and very effectively. Also check out our Word K-12 series.

Super Street Fighter 4: Arcade Edition Pocket Guide Ever forget how many startup frames Ryu’s EX Shoryuken is? Now you can look it up instantly in our all-inclusive guide made by dedicated SSF4 players for dedicated SSF4 players. All 39 characters have complete move lists and detailed frame data. -- Move Lists ---- Unique Attacks ---- Throws ---- Special Moves ---- Super Combos ---- Ultra Combos -- Frame Data ---- Startup ---- Active ---- Recovery ---- On Guard ---- On Hit ---- Block H/L ---- Damage ---- Stun ---- Special Notes [Note: Cancel Ability and Super Meter Gain weren’t included because we wanted to be minimalistic and didn't think they were necessary for a player using a portable pocket guide.] Both move list and frame data charts are scrollable horizontally and vertically, with the top “Label” row and the left “Move Name” column always static. A lot of attention was put into this app to make this data look visually appealing and presentable, so try it out and let us know what you think! An ad-free Pro version is also available.

description: The UFC Fan application will be your favorite mobile companion when preparing for an upcoming UFC event or while watching one live from anywhere in the world. Watch every UFC event with Fight Rhythm – the new live stats tool that allows you to follow who is control of the fight at any given time during a bout. Or, score the fight action live on your phone, watch highlights from the previous fights, play UFC Fantasy Pick’em, get breaking news, see the most recent fighter rankings and stats, and watch the live streams of weigh-in and press conferences. And if you are attending the live event, you can listen along to the cornermen while watching the fight with the red and blue corner audio feature. Should you run into a Fighter, take their picture using the application and then follow up by having them autograph it with their finger. Those features and others will make this your favorite mobile companion to complement your appetite for UFC. Geo-location will be used to provide fans with targeted messaging via push notification and access to extra audio feeds inside venues. Please make sure your geo-location is enabled to access these features.

It has taken over in the sequel to the caterpillar and aunt, to say simple operation, and moderate difficulty. The operation, in addition to the touch panel, also possible with any physical key, use the physical key is recommended in the case of model physical key is attached.

L-Price ou Lista de Preço, é um excelente aplicativo que tem como objetivo ajudá-lo a economizar e organizar suas compras de supermercado. O L-Price vem com diversas funcionalidades faceis e práticos de serem usados e manipulados para que você possa ter sucesso na sua economia. O Sistema L-Price, está representado em 5 módulos, são eles: - Cadastrar de Produto Este módulo você pode cadastrar todos os seu produtos de acorco com as categoria de cada um dos mesmos. O sistema irá exibir uma listagem de categoria, selecione a categoria específica e pressione o botão "+" no canto superior da tela. Antes de informar a descricão do produto, primeiramente pressione em uma imagem que está representada como uma estrela, para verificar se existe alguma imagem para representar o seu produto, se tiver pressione a imagem específica, caso não tenha, então pressione novamente a imagem estrela. - Cadastrar Loja Este módulo você pode cadastrar todos os supermercados ou lojas aonde as compras serão realizadas. - Ir as Compras Este módulo é o carrinho virtual. Nessa etapa você deve escolher o supermercado aonde a compra será realizada, e logo após, o sistema irá exibir uma tela que irá representar o seu carrinho real, nessa tela irá conter todos os seus produtos e informações de detalhado dos preços de cada produto presente no seu carrinho, e além do valor total de pagamento. Para adicionar um produto no carrinho você tem duas formas de fazer esse procedimento. O primeiro é, quando o carrinho estiver vazio o sistema mostra a opção de adicionar no carrinho os produtos pre-selecionados, que o usuário realizou no menu "Selecionar Produtos". E o Segundo você deve pressionar em uma imagem que representa um carrinho de compras, logo após, o sistema exibirá uma tela de categoria, você escolhe a categoria do produto que você quer adicionar, o sistema irá mostrar uma listagem de todos os produtos pertencente a essa categoria , selecione o seu produto (Caso, o produto ainda não esteja cadastrado, basta você pressionar o butão "+" no canto superior da tela e cadastrar o seu produto), o sistema irá exibir novamente uma tela de detalhamento no qual você irá informar: - Embalagem do produto pressionando no campo "unidade"; - O valor unitário (preço) do produto Obs: informar o valor que está na prateleira ou na gondola; - E a quantidade que deseja levar, e o sistema calcula automaticamente quanto você vai pagar, para que você não possa ter algum susto na boca do caixa. Caso esteja tudo certo você pressione no butão "Adicionar no Carrinho" o sistema retornará a tela de listagem de produtos para que você possa adicionar outros produtos. Pronto! você já adicionou um produto no carrinho. O sistema L-Price, lhe proporciona tambem, após a segunda compra, você comparar o valor do produto com a compra passada independente de supermercado. - Compras Realizadas Este módulo o sistema informa todo o históricos de compras realizadas, informa a data da compra realizada, os supermercados aonde foram realizadas essas compras e a listagem de produtos comprados com seus respectivos preços e o valor total do carrinho. - Selecionar Produtos Este módulo o sistema lista todos os produtos cadastrados de acordo com suas categorias, para que o usuário possa selecionar os produtos mais comprados. Por favor, classifique app L-Price, entre em contato conosco com qualquer pergunta que possa ter. Obrigado. Proxy Settings provides a set of tools to ease the access and the modification of proxy server configuration into your Android device when you are connected to any Wi-Fi (at the moment setting the proxy on Mobile network is not supported). Please remember that configuring the proxy doesn't mean that all your applications will automatically start to using these settings! This is due to a not easy understandable API for developers. If you are interested in a deeper analysis of this issue, you can find a detailed explanation of the problem and leave your feedbacks/comments on: * the official GitHub project page: https://github.com/shouldit/android-proxy * or just reach us at: info@shouldit.be The project offers also an open source module called Android Proxy Library (APL) that provides to the developers an easy way to access and use the proxy settings in every Android application. So, if you want the Proxy support in your favourite applications, start request this feature to their developers!

Fractals have infinite possibilities and are a little cosmos in their own right. Hense the name of the application. All the wallpapers are contained within the application so there are no further downloads or waiting for a connection once installed. All the wallpapers are compatible with the latest devices such as the Samsung Galaxy S5, HTC One M8, Google Nexus 5 or LG G2. You may use these images for your own personal use or share them with your friends. Please feel free to rate this application if you have enjoyed it. This is the first in a set of three fractal wallpaper applications. the others are Fractal Fractal and Fractal Colors This application is ad supported. It uses only Google's official Admob banners and interstitials. Ads only appear within the application and are a means of supporting further development.
release_text: Major Update. 120 wallpapers added with more to come. These are all full HD and are downloadable from a newly created blog. This makes them easy to browse but does not add to the overall size of the application. The original 75 wallpapers are still contained within the application and can be installed without any further downloads. If you have a large screen device you may chose to download the higher definition version from the blog.

description: The combination of imaginative video sequences and cheerful songs will help you learn basic everyday words the fun and efficient way! PetraLingua® lessons are designed for children between the ages of 3 and 10 years, but also for grownups who still feel the child inside of them! How do PetraLingua® lessons grab the children's attention and develop their love of language learning? Below you'll find eight tips of an experienced teacher: - Generating curiosity - Using an interesting story - Using fun and humour - Relating a personal experience - A friendly mascot that guides the children through the lessons - Repeating the same topic using different approaches - Repeated listening to the audio picture dictionary helps us memorize the words - Using the need for self-affirmation Features: - Introductory video sequence Petralingua® Spanish teaches the kids the basics of Spanish through common everyday situations (Toys). New vocabulary is introduced through an introductory video sequence. Lovable creatures and animated films will be interesting for learners of all ages. - Revision video The introductory video is followed by a revision version. After the beep, the children repeat the words and sentences spoken by a native speaker in the video. This way, they practice language structures and develop their speaking skills. - Spanish learning song The lesson includes a song composed to repeat and practice the vocabulary from the lesson. Children will gladly listen to the cheerful melodies more then once and quickly memorize the new words. - Sing along activities The song is followed by an instrumental version, so the children can sing alone to the known melody and proudly show what they have learned. - Talking Picture Dictionary The audio picture dictionary can be used to help us remember the words that were introduced in the videos, repeat the words after the speaker, but also to practice writing. For the complete course, please visit the official PetraLingua® website: www.petralingua.com About PetraLingua® Currently available courses: English, French, Spanish, German, Russian and Chinese. Contents of PetraLingua® online multimedia language courses for chidren: • 20 everyday topics • 11 songs • 80 animated videos • 140 interactive exercises • 500 basic words • talking picture dictionary • Activity Books to download We’ll use songs, animated videos, interactive exercises, comics and rhetorics to take your everyday worries away and free your mind to learn a new language! Interesting interactive exercises will help you check what you’ve learned and improve your vocabulary! The exercises are never the same, because every time you refresh the page, you get a different set of words and sentences to practice! PetraLingua® foreign language courses for children are supported on all major current browsers and platforms including Windows, MAC, iPad®, iPhone® and Android® tablets and phones. Also available: Complete PetraLingua® Language Learning Sets Feedback and support: If you have any questions, email us on support (at) petralingua.com or visit our website www.petralingua.com Follow us: http://www.facebook.com/petralingua http://twitter.com/petralingua http://www.pinterest.com/petralingua http://plus.google.com/?hl=en

description: Welcome to our collection of traffic apps for the UK road network. We aim to deliver a traffic app that will help you keep up-to-date on the latest traffic incidents from the major roads across the UK. Whether this is a specific road or a collection of roads you want to check, our traffic apps will help you avoid traffic en-route to your destination. The M6 Traffic News app is an incredibly useful tool featuring the latest updates on traffic from the busy M6 motorway. Whether there is a disruptive road/lane closure; an accident; congestion or any other incident for that matter, you will find the latest updates here. This is a must-have app for anyone who travels and is perfect for accessing prior to you leaving your location, in order to help ensure you avoid any problems en-route. What you get: • Latest (Traffic updates via RSS) • Twitter (Traffic updates via Twitter) • Share (Help spread the word!) • Map (Live updates via Google Maps utilising the 'Traffic Layer' to highlight traffic flow using a highlighted line)* • Feedback (Send your feedback to the developers) • Mailing List (Sign up to our mailing list) • Appdesigned4u (Link to our website) * Map Google Maps will either show current colour-coded traffic conditions on roads where data is available or display a message that data is unavailable. These speeds don't apply to traffic on smaller roads such as those within cities, which have lower speed limits. For roads smaller than main roads, the colours give an indication of the severity of the traffic. Green means that traffic conditions are good, yellow means fair, and red or red/black means poor traffic conditions. Please note that you may need to apply the 'Traffic' layer within Google Maps to enable this feature. This is easily achievable by simply selecting the 'Settings' feature and clicking on 'Traffic'. Important Information: For obvious safety reasons, please refrain from using this app whilst in the control of a vehicle. This is understandably for your own safety and the safety of others. Please note that this app requires the use of a stable connection to the internet to update the various in-app features. We have made every effort to ensure the in-app features apply to the specific road/s in question. However, from time to time there may be other unrelated information included. All of the traffic feeds in this app are reliant on the various sources keeping these up-to-date. Please understand that we have no control over this and we simply can only advise our users to try the in-app feature at a later date/time to see if the applicable feature has been updated. Please understand that this app utilises various advertising in the form of banners and various page links to external sites. Although many of the adverts are not related to the app itself, they have been included to help support the ongoing development of the app. Please view our other related apps in the app store (if available) that do not include any advertisements, and may instead include extra features! There will typically be a small extra charge for an ad-free higher specification version. If you do experience any issues with this app, please contact us using the 'Feedback' facility in the app rather than leaving us a negative star rating and/or review. We will always try to endeavour to fix a problem in the app for the benefit of all of our users. Finally, if you do like our app, please be so kind to leave us a high star rating and a review. We greatly appreciate your support! Disclaimer: This app is in no way associated to any of transport organisations used in this app in the UK or beyond. All of the feeds included are the property of their respectful owners, and this app simply serves the purpose of directing the user to that specific source. The RSS traffic feeds utilised are provided by the Highways Agency ( http://www.highways.gov.uk ) and are freely available to use for commercial purposes.
